content: On the latest episode of “ The King of Mask Singer ,” “Jang Geum” blew the audience away with her singing! During the September 15 broadcast of the MBC singing competition, four contestants moved forward in their quest to challenge the reigning champion for the throne. In the first match-up of Round 2, Jang Geum sang a stunning rendition of Ailee ’s “Ice Flower” (from the soundtrack of the hit drama “ Queen of Ambition ”). After watching her performance, the celebrity panelists lavished praise on Jang Geum for her beautiful voice and skillful singing technique. Seomoon Tak declared that Jang Geum seemed like an experienced veteran singer, while tripleS’s ChaeYeon guessed that she was a girl group member. Jang Geum ultimately won the round 68-31 and advanced to Round 3, where she performed a soulful cover of Jung Key’s “Alone.” Jang Geum also emerged the winner of Round 3, and she moved on to face off against the reigning champion, “Under the Sea,” in the final round. Although both singers impressed the audience with their performances, Under the Sea ultimately defended her title as champion, leaving Jang Geum to reveal her identity to the crowd. Jang Geum turned out to be none other than LIGHTSUM’s main vocalist Chowon, who first entered the spotlight as a contestant on Mnet’s 2018 survival show “Produce 48.” After Chowon described how she got her start in the industry as a child model and actor, host Kim Sung Joo asked her about her goals for the future. title: Más del 90 % de los peruanos desaprueba la gestión de Dina Boluarte, según una encuesta
creator: RT en Español
content: El índice de desaprobación de la gestión de Dina Boluarte como presidenta de Perú se mantiene en el 91 %, mientras que solo el 6 % de los ciudadanos peruanos respalda su forma de gobernar el país, según la última encuesta de Datum, publicada este domingo para el diario El Comercio. El sondeo también reveló que el 72 % desaprueba la gestión del presidente del Congreso , Eduardo Salhuna. Además, el 79 % rechaza que Boluarte mantenga en el cargo de ministro del Interior a Juan José Santiváñez Antúnez. El estudio se llevó a cabo entre los pasados 6 y 10 de septiembre entre 1.211 hombres y mujeres de entre 18 y 70 años de edad.

title: 14 بطاقة صفراء في مباراة واحدة في "البريميرليغ"
content: فارس عقاقني_ شهدت مباراة تشيلسي ومضيفه بورنموث، في الدوري الإنجليزي الممتاز، إشهار الحكم أنتوني تايلور 14 بطاقة صفراء، في رقم قياسي جديد "بالبريميرليغ". ومع إشهار الحكم أنتوني تايلور للبطاقة الصفراء عدة مرات بسبب المخالفات أو الحديث الجانبي معه، تلقى تشيلسي ثماني بطاقات صفراء، فيما تلقى لاعبوا بورنوث 6 بطاقات، بالإضافة إلى إنذار كلا المدربين، ليكسر الرقم القياسي في عدد البطاقات الممنوحة خلال مباراة واحدة في الدوري الإنجليزي الممتاز. وقال "انزو ماريسكا" مدرب نادي تشلسي :"هذا العدد من البطاقات الصفراء لا يمثل مشكلة بالنسبة لي، هذا هو الحال، في بعض الأحيان تتحكم المباراة في الطريقة التي تتصرف بها". كما تعتبر الجولة الرابعة من "البريميرليغ" هي أكثر جولة خرجت فيها بطاقات صفراء في تاريخ الدوري الإنجليزي الممتازبـ 60 بطاقة صفراء. ونجح تشيلسي في الفوز بالمباراة، ليحقق الفريق "اللندني" انتصاره الثاني خارج أرضه من مباراتين، ليتقدم للمركز السابع في الترتيب بسبع نقاط من أربع مباريات، فيما يحتل بورنموث المركز 11 بخمس نقاط. كما أنهى الفريق سلسلة من 17 مباراة خارج أرضه في الدوري الإنجليزي الممتاز، دون أن يحافظ على شباكه.

title: Hamilton "im Tal der Tränen": Wolff hat Mitleid nach "hartem Tag" in Baku
content: (Motorsport-Total.com) - Harter Tag im Büro für Lewis Hamilton : Nach dem Tausch diverser Motorteile muss der Rekordweltmeister dem Feld in Baku am Sonntag aus der Box hinterherjagen. Am Ende steht im Ziel ein hart erkämpfter neunter Platz für Hamilton zu Buche, denn das Überholen erweist sich für den Mercedes-Star vor allem im DRS-Zug auf den langen Geraden des Kurses am Kaspischen Meer als äußerst schwer. © Motorsport Images Lewis Hamilton dürfte das Wochenende in Baku eher schnell vergessen wollen Zoom "Ich wusste ja schon vorher, dass es ein harter Tag wird", winkt Hamilton nach der Zieldurchfahrt ab. "Dieses Rennen war das beste Rennen, um es zu machen", sagt der Brite mit Blick auf die für den Motorwechsel fällig Strafe, und seinen ohnehin nicht berauschenden siebten Startplatz im Qualifying. Mit seinem Samstag hadert der Brite aber auch 24 Stunden später noch, denn: "Wir hatten am Freitag ein großartiges Auto, haben dann die kleinsten Änderungen für Samstag vorgenommen. Eine der Komponenten war nicht korrekt gebaut, und das hat uns am Samstag in die falsche Richtung geleitet. Das haben wir aber erst am Ende des Tages rausgefunden." Aus der Not machen die Silberpfeile dann in gewisser Weise eine Tugend, nützen das ohnehin verkorkste Wochenende, um neue Motorenkomponenten in Hamiltons Pool einzuspeisen, mit denen er nun idealerweise bis zum Saisonende auskommt - auf Kosten des Resultats in Baku, versteht sich. "Ich wusste, dass wir heute nicht würden...

title: Ministro del Minem, Rómulo Mucho, sobre crisis en Petroperú: Si no se le apoya financieramente paralizaría en septiembre
content: Alberto Fujimori . Premios Emmy . Alianza Lima vs Mannucci . Incendios forestales . Fonavi . Dólar en Perú . Ley Soto . Metro de Lima . Horóscopo . Dolar BCV . DolarToday . ÚLTIMAS NOTICIAS POLÍTICA ECONOMÍA SOCIEDAD MUNDO PERÚ DEPORTES ESPECTÁCULOS CINE Y SERIES DÓLAR SUSCRÍBETE Últimas Noticias Las consecuencias de la posible paralización de Petroperú impactarían sectores clave como transporte, generación eléctrica y minería, comprometiendo el abastecimiento en regiones vitales del país. El ministro de Energía y Minas, Rómulo Mucho, alertó sobre la situación crítica que atraviesa Petroperú , asegurando que la estatal petrolera podría paralizar sus operaciones en septiembre si no recibe apoyo financiero . En una entrevista para RPP, el titular de dicha cartera respaldó los decretos de urgencia que el Ejecutivo ha implementado para evitar esta crisis. “Si no hay un apoyo financiero, la empresa prácticamente paralizaría en septiembre debido a la imposibilidad de importar crudo, lo que afectaría la distribución de combustibles a nivel nacional”, advirtió. Mucho detalló que esta paralización tendría consecuencias graves para diversos sectores del país, como el transporte de carga pesada, la generación eléctrica, la aviación y la minería, además de comprometer el abastecimiento de combustibles en regiones clave como Loreto, donde Petroperú abastece el 97% del mercado, así como en Madre de Dios y Piura. title: Vikings WR Justin Jefferson suffers bruised quad but optimistic playing next week
creator: Associated Press
content: MINNEAPOLIS — Minnesota Vikings wide receiver Justin Jefferson was forced out of the game in the third quarter of their 23-17 victory over San Francisco on Sunday with a bruised right quadriceps, leaving him with significant soreness but guarded optimism about playing next week. Jefferson was blocking on the play late in the third quarter when he collided with teammate Garrett Bradbury and also took contact from 49ers linebacker Fred Warner. Jefferson, who caught a 97-yard touchdown pass in the second quarter, was in significant pain on the turf before limping off the field with assistance from the medical staff. Jefferson, who missed seven games last season with a hamstring injury, finished with four receptions for 133 yards on seven targets. “I’m feeling good,” he said. “We played tremendous ball all around, and at the end of the day all that matters is we’re winning and I’m not seriously injured.” The Vikings (2-0) host Houston next Sunday. “Not overly concerned, just a little thigh bruise, contusion, whatever you want to call it, something that happens a lot during football,” Jefferson said. “Just got to treat it up, get it feeling well and be ready to go next week.”

title: “El gobierno no puede ser tan ineficiente”: Alejandra Baigorria hace duro descargo en medio de los incendios forestales
content: . La emergencia ambiental es tema no solo entre los activistas, también voces de la farándula se sumaron en solidaridad, desde , la Miss Grand Internacional y más recientemente . PUBLICIDAD La empresaria dio espacio en sus redes sociales para comentar sobre la situación en el Amazonas y ls más e 173 incendios que se reportaron en la selva peruana, lo que ha afectado además zonas de importancia histórica, reservas naturales y el hábitat de diversas especies. Las acciones que se vienen tomando permiten hacer frente a esta emergencia en donde ya el 60 % de incendios ha sido controlado. Sin embargo, las críticas continuaron a la gestión. “El país se incendia y la Amazonía está desapareciendo por el fuego. title: Rock in Rio vive domingo família em dia dedicado a apresentações de rock
creator: Yuri Eiras
content: O Rock in Rio tem clima familiar neste domingo (15), dia das atrações de rock. Apesar das roupas pretas e fortes maquiagens, pais, mães e filhos deitam no gramado artificial da Cidade do Rock e interagem como em um piquenique. O line-up formado por bandas de diferentes gerações, como o Deep Purple —que lançou o primeiro disco em 1968— e o Evanescence —cujo álbum de estreia é de 2003— misturou gerações e faixas etárias. A escolha das bandas permitiu ainda o reencontro de antigos roqueiros com o próprio Rock in Rio , quase 40 anos depois da primeira edição, em 1985. Hedilamar Freze, 59, tinha 19 anos quando sujou os pés para assistir ao show do Queen na primeira edição do Rock in Rio. Neste domingo, mais confortável, foi ao festival com dois sobrinhos adolescentes, o cunhado e a irmã, que tinha 8 anos em 1985 e não pôde ir. "Eu fazia faculdade de história da arte e vim com os colegas de turma em 1985. Passamos o perrengue da lama. Transporte quase não tinha, comida era pouca, bebida era pouca, vinha-se com a cara e a coragem. Mas a energia não muda", diz. Eucyr Moreira, 60, reencontrou o festival duas décadas depois da sua estreia no festival. Em 2001, ano da terceira edição, esteve na antiga Cidade do Rock, um outro terreno na Barra da Tijuca, para assistir ao Iron Maiden. Neste domingo, esteve na Cidade do Rock com uma camiseta com a frase "Eu curto rock com meu filho". O filho vestia a estampa "Eu curto rock com meu pai".

title: Sel felaketi can aldı: 'Doğal afet durumu' ilan edildi
content: Başbakan Donald Tusk, kasırganın güney ve güneybatı bölgelerinde büyük zarara yol açması nedeniyle doğal afet ilan etti. Tusk, bu adımın doğal afetlerinin olası sorunların önlenmesi ve zararlarının düzeltilmesi amacıyla atıldığını duyurdu. Ayrıca kasırganın neden olduğu finansal alarmı sağlamak için Avrupa Birliği'nden mali yardım talebinde bulunacağını belirtti. 'Doğal afet durumu' ilanıyla birlikte, sel ve su baskınlarından etkilenen kişisel hak ve özgürlüklerde kısıtlamalar getirilebilecek ve bu durum en fazla 30 gün sürebilecek. Sellerde 2 Kişi Hayatını Kaybetti Polonya 'nın faaliyetini sürdüren yoğun yağışlar, çok sayıda nehrin taşmasına ve birçok yerleşim yerinin sular altında tutulmasına neden oldu. Stronie Slaskie'deki barajın yıkılması, Glucholazy'de ise bir köprü yıkıldı. Klodzko ve Bielsko Biala kentlerinde iki kişi sel sularına kapılarak hayatlarını kaybetti.

title: The Emmy Awards' most viral and comical blunders - from Trump skit to Ellen roast
creator: Connor McCrory
content: The 76th Primetime Emmy Awards returned to Los Angeles ’s Peacock Theater on Sunday night, following a second assassination attempt on former President Donald Trump earlier in the day . This delay followed a historic 118-day Hollywood actors' strike . Hosted by Eugene and Dan Levy , this y ear's event is set to showcase standout performances from television’s top stars, following acting legend Jack Black winning his first Emmy last year . Selena Gomez 'no longer hangs out' with Taylor Swift due to her pals Matthew Perry's 'biggest regret' that tormented him before tragic death Shogun led the nominations with 25 nods, while The Bear set a record for the most comedy nominations in a single year with 23. The Emmy Awards have a history rich with memorable moments, from Donald Trump 's surprising skit to heartfelt on-stage proposals. 1975: Lucille Ball Cue Card Blunder As the 2024 ceremony unfolds, Daily Express US is highlighting unforgettable incidents that have come to light over the past 7 decades. In 1975, comedian Lucille Ball had audiences in stitches when she took to the stage to announce the nominees and winner for Outstanding Comedy. A notable hiccup occurred when Ball left her glasses on her seat, leaving her unable to read her cue card. Fellow comedian Milton Berle stepped in to assist, enacting a laugh from the audience. title: CHiQ gewinnt Global Product Technology Innovation Awards
content: BERLIN , 16. September 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- Das 1958 gegründete Unternehmen Changhong hat sich in mehr als sechs Jahrzehnten zu einer umfassenden multinationalen Unternehmensgruppe entwickelt, die sich auf Unterhaltungselektronik sowie auf die Forschung und Herstellung von Kernkomponenten spezialisiert hat. Das Unternehmen strebt nun an, ein weltweit einflussreicher Konzern in der elektronischen Informationstechnologie zu werden. Von Januar bis August 2024 stieg der Umsatz von Changhong mit Haushaltsgeräten in Übersee im Vergleich zum Vorjahr um über 20 %. In Kernmärkten wie Amerika, Asien-Pazifik und Europa konnte das Niveau gehalten werden und nimmt weiterhin stetig zu. In aufstrebenden Märkten wie dem Nahen Osten und Afrika wurden bedeutende Durchbrüche erzielt, die nach und nach ein globales Layout der Übersee-Haushaltsgeräteindustrie von Changhong bilden. Auf der IFA 2024 wurde die CHiQ XingBo-Serie von Changhong für ihre außergewöhnliche technische Leistung mit dem „Extraordinary Audiovisual Experiences Gold Award" ausgezeichnet. Als High-End-Flaggschiff hat dieser Fernseher seit seiner Markteinführung im August 2023 schnell eine führende Position auf dem Markt für 288Hz-Fernseher mit hoher Bildwiederholfrequenz eingenommen. Der CHiQ-Fernseher der XingBo-Serie mit ihrem schlanken, sechsseitigen, flachen Design und der robusten Wärmeableitungstechnologie liefern Bilder in Kinoqualität. Ausgestattet mit der weltweit ersten großen modellbasierten...

title: Cowboys star Micah Parsons willing to wait out extension
creator: Adam La Rose, Pro Football Rumors
content: Both Dak Prescott and CeeDee Lamb landed monster Cowboys extensions ahead of Week 1. Micah Parsons was eligible for a second contract during the offseason, but to little surprise he did not engage in serious contract talks during the summer. Parsons has made it clear to the Cowboys front office that no extension talks will take place during the regular season . The 2021 Defensive Rookie of the Year’s attention is focused on another campaign with standout production, something which would help his bargaining power. Parsons is also well aware of where the edge market as a whole currently stands, though. Ian Rapoport of NFL Network confirms Parsons is prepared for a lengthy wait to secure his second contract. Part of the negotiating process will depend on what happens with the league’s other contracts at the top of the position’s market. As Rapoport notes, both T.J. Watt and Myles Garrett could hammer out new deals with their respective teams next offseason; Watt’s Steelers pact runs through 2025 and does not include guaranteed salary for its final year. Garrett is on the books though 2026 and he too does not have guaranteed salaries beyond the current year. Watt and Garrett have seen their deals surpassed in terms of annual average value over the past two years. Nick Bosa inked a 49ers extension averaging $34M per year in 2023, while this past offseason saw Josh Hines-Allen (Jaguars) and Brian Burns (Giants) slot second and third in terms of AAV. If market corrections are made...

title: Javier Milei presenta el Presupuesto 2025: seguí la cobertura EN VIVO de Crónica
creator: (Diario Crónica)
content: El presidente Javier Milei asistirá esta noche al Congreso para presentar el proyecto de Presupuesto 2025 . El jefe de Estado brindará un discurso en la Cámara de Diputados y se estima que se extenderá por 45 minutos. El líder de La Libertad Avanza tocará varios temas calientes, como las proyecciones del dólar y la inflación, el nivel del gasto del Estado, la regla del “ déficit cero ” y la deuda con el FMI, entre otros. Se espera una propuesta “ liberal y austera que será el fin de los curros ”, según se anticipó, al igual que los clásicos “ dardos ” contra la “ casta ” y los detractores del Gobierno. Javier Milei presentará el Presupuesto 2025: reducida presencia de la oposición A diferencia de lo que ocurrió el 1 de marzo, cuando el presidente inauguró el período de sesiones ordinarias, bloques opositores concurrirán este domingo con delegaciones reducidas . Unión por la Patria solo enviará un grupo integrado por los legisladores que conforman la comisión de Presupuesto y Hacienda. Encuentro Federal también asistirá este domingo, pero solo lo harán cuatro de sus 16 legisladores, ya que participarán el presidente de EF, Miguel Ángel Pichetto, acompañado por Margarita Stolbizer, Esteban Paulon y Florencio Randazzo. El Frente de Izquierda , en tanto, decidió que no concurrirá. Solo garantizan una presencia completa la bancada oficialista de La Libertad Avanza , el PRO , y los bloques provinciales más cercanos al oficialismo como Independencia,...

title: Grand-Nord camerounais : appel à des projets d'envergure au-delà des dons symboliques :: CAMEROON
creator: Paul Moutila
content: La récente distribution d'huile végétale dans le Grand-Nord du Cameroun par la ministre Celestine Ketcha Courtès a suscité une vive réaction au sein de la population locale. Cette action, perçue comme symbolique, a mis en lumière le décalage entre les attentes des habitants et les réponses apportées par le gouvernement. Les populations du Grand-Nord, connues pour leur loyauté envers le Président Paul Biya, expriment aujourd'hui leur désir de voir se concrétiser des projets d'infrastructure majeurs. Parmi les réalisations attendues figurent la route Ngaoundéré-Garoua, l'axe Mora-Kousseri, une digue-route sur le Logone, ainsi que l'ambitieux projet de chemin de fer reliant Ngaoundéré à Kousseri. Ces infrastructures sont considérées comme essentielles pour le développement économique et social de la région. Elles permettraient de désenclaver des zones isolées, de faciliter les échanges commerciaux et d'améliorer significativement la qualité de vie des habitants. La distribution d'huile végétale, bien que bienveillante dans son intention, a été perçue comme une sous-estimation des besoins réels et des aspirations de la population. Cette action a été interprétée comme une forme de condescendance , réduisant l'attachement profond des habitants envers leur président à une simple question d'aide alimentaire ponctuelle. Cette situation met en lumière un enjeu plus large : la nécessité d'une compréhension approfondie des besoins locaux...

title: Man shot dead, 2 stabbed in fight in Humboldt Park
creator: Sun-Times Wire
content: A man was killed and two others wounded in a shooting and stabbing in Humboldt Park on Sunday morning, Chicago police said. A group of people were in a “physical altercation” in the 3100 block of West Luis Munoz Marin Drive about 11:23 a.m. when shots were fired, police said. A 47-year-old man was shot in the back and taken to Mt. Sinai Hospital, where he later died. Two other men, 42 and 35, were stabbed in the face and taken to Stroger Hospital in fair condition, police said. No one is in custody.

title: Dash players express frustration amid coach's extended absence: 'There's a lot we're missing'
content: The Houston Dash is now winless in its last nine NWSL games, sits firmly at the bottom of the league’s standings, has scored just two goals in nine games and has not had its head coach Fran Alonso on the sideline since June. After the team’s most recent loss, a 3-0 defeat to the Washington Spirit on Sunday, Dash players expressed frustration over their current situation. Advertisement “I think there are a lot of things that need to improve at many levels. It’s not all here on the field from game to game,” forward Diana Ordóñez told Spanish-language media Desde La Linea Podcast after the game. “There are things we need, like our head coach coming back — or another (head coach). We’re missing a lot of help. The part we can do is work and try and play as a team, but there’s a lot we’re missing.” Alonso, who was hired in December 2023, has not been with the team since late June when the club said he had an illness that precluded him from traveling with the team for an away game against the Kansas City Current. He has since been on an extended leave of absence while assistant coach Ricky Clarke has served as interim head coach. Assistant coach Gilberto Damiano, whom the Dash announced they had hired in March , is also no longer listed on their staff’s roster. Ordóñez’s comment after the game seems to reflect a larger teamwide struggle to work its way through the season while dealing with multiple on and off field issues, including finding a stable roster. High-profile spring...

title: Kirby pitches 7 strong innings and Garver homers in 3 to lift Mariners over Rangers 7-0

content: SEATTLE (AP) — faced the minimum number of batters and gave up one hit in seven sparkling innings, and the shut out the 7-0 to earn a series victory and keep pace in the AL West and wild-card races. hit a three-run home run against his former team in the first inning and added a solo shot in the seventh. Kirby also had his own back, participating in four putouts, including completing the day’s most oddball play in the fourth inning. hit what appeared to be a routine grounder to at first base. But the ball bounced off Turner’s glove and ricocheted directly to second baseman standing about 10 yards away. Moore quickly threw to Kirby, who made a feet-first leap to get the force out at first. It was Kirby’s sixth consecutive win over the Rangers. He’s 6-0 in eight starts over his three-year career with 41 strikeouts and five walks, and pushed his career ERA against the AL West rivals from 1.08 to 0.92. title: RAI, Rimedio sbotta: "La Lega nasconde le immagini degli scontri di Cagliari-Napoli"
creator: AreaNapoli.it
content: Alberto Rimedio , ai microfoni de La Domenica Sportiva si è soffermato sui disordini che si sono verificati durante Cagliari-Napoli , partita vinta per 0-4 dalla squadra di Antonio Conte allo stadio 'Unipol Domus' in Sardegna: "É mai possibile che i telespettatori non possano sapere, che non abbiano la possibilità di vedere cosa stia succedendo allo stadio?" ha criticato il cronista dell'emittente di Stato e voce che ha raccontato diverse partite della Nazionale. "Secondo voi - ha aggiunto Rimedio - è una cosa normale che la Lega vieti le immagini di questi scontri e neghi le riprese alle Tv che devono ricevere, al massimo, le immagini dai cellulari dei tifosi? I telespettatori che pagano, a mio avviso, devono avere il diritto di sapere perché la partita è stata sospesa per sette minuti, come successo nel caso di Cagliari-Napoli" ha lamentato l'opinionista, evidenziando quanto accaduto in questa giornata di Serie A.

title: Marchegiani: "Conte ha una bella matassa da sbrogliare. Può essere un problema"
creator: AreaNapoli.it
content: Luca Marchegiani , ospite abituale degli studi di Sky Sport , ha espresso alcune considerazioni sul Napoli, reduce dalla vittoria per 0-4 in casa del Cagliari, ai microfoni di Sky Calcio Club , trasmissione condotta da Fabio Caressa: "Altra buona prestazione di Romelu Lukaku? È il modo di giocare, il suo, che piace ad Antonio Conte, quello che serve alle squadre del mister salentino... Questa sua presenza fisica, questa consapevolezza di potersi appoggiare a lui, dando spazio agli inserimenti di Khvicha Kvaratskhelia e Matteo Politano, ha cambiato modo di attaccare del Napoli". Marchegiani ha poi aggiunto: "L'unica cosa su cui vorrei riflettere, non un dubbio ma una matassa che Conte deve saper sbrogliare bene, è che ci sono tanti giocatori importanti nella sua rosa, ma non possono certo essere utilizzati tutti allo stesso modo. Il turnover aiuta ad avere un assetto nel tempo, ma non è che puoi coinvolgerli tutti... Ci sono giocatori arrivati con delle aspettative, e considerarli solo delle alternative può diventare un problema".

title: Adani: "Cagliari-Napoli, che spettacolo triste in un posto meraviglioso"
creator: AreaNapoli.it
content: Daniele Adani , ex calciatore professionista, di ruolo difensore, oggi commentatore tecnico ed opinionista della redazione di RAI Sport , ha rilasciato alcune dichiarazioni ai microfoni de 'La Domenica Sportiva', trasmissione in onda sulle frequenze di Rai 2, soffermandosi sugli scontri verificatisi durante Cagliari-Napoli : " Spettacolo triste in un posto meraviglioso che è Cagliari. Il calcio è sempre una festa, dover vedere e commentare certi atti in una partita di calcio è assurdo. La Lega pensa di fare giustizia nascondendo queste immagini, per cercare di vendere meglio un prodotto. Certi atti incivili vanno condannati". Ricordiamo che il Napoli di Antonio Conte ha vinto la partita per 0-4, portando a casa 3 punti fondamentali per balzare momentaneamente alla testa della classifica del campionato italiano di Serie A, che vede la compagine partenopea prima in solitaria, a quota 9, in attesa di capire cosa accadrà nelle gare di Hellas Verona ed Udinese (rispettivamente contro Lazio e Parma, n.d.r.), che potrebbero cambiare nuovamente la parte alta della graduatoria, mettendo in discussione la posizione ottenuta dagli azzurri.

title: Parties condemn SL govt for tonsuring TN fishermen
creator: Agency
content: Rameshwaram, Sept 16: Leaders of the Pattali Makkal Katchi (PMK) and the Communist Party of India (Marxist) [CPI(M)] have strongly condemned the Sri Lankan government for its mistreatment of Tamil Nadu fishermen. The condemnation follows reports that five fishermen, arrested by the Sri Lankan navy, were tonsured and forced to clean prison toilets and drainage. The fishermen were apprehended on August 27 while fishing in the Bay of Bengal. In a statement, PMK founder Dr. S. Ramadoss expressed outrage over the incident, calling it an affront to India’s sovereignty. “Of the eight fishermen arrested, three were imprisoned while five were released after paying a penalty. However, Sri Lanka subjected these five fishermen to degrading treatment, citing that the penalty was not paid on September 6, but only on September 7,” Ramadoss explained. He criticized both the central and Tamil Nadu governments for remaining passive on the issue and urged immediate action based on international laws. CPI(M) State Secretary K. Balakrishnan echoed Ramadoss’ sentiments, slamming the central government for its lack of intervention. In his statement, Balakrishnan criticized the government’s diplomatic inaction, claiming it has led to repeated assaults on Indian fishermen. “The central government has continuously avoided addressing the fishermen issue, allowing these attacks to persist,” he remarked. To intensify pressure, Balakrishnan announced that a mass protest would be held in Rameshwaram on...

title: Phil Foden’s son, 5, set to become star by entertaining fans as a YouTuber
creator: Richard Moriarty
content: FOOTIE ace Phil Foden’s five-year-old son is set to smash the net again — with his own YouTube channel. Ronnie already has five million Instagram followers after dancing on the pitch following his dad’s 2023 Champions League triumph with Manchester City. Now the cheeky chap could cash in on his fame by entertaining fans as a YouTuber after dad Phil, 23 , and mum Rebecca, 22 , set up a channel for him. A source said: “Ronnie loves being the centre of attention and is a big fan of some of the YouTubers so Phil and his mum have set up an account. “He could end up making loads of money from it.” Speaking about his son’s celebrations in Istanbul, Phil said: “His personality has made him who he is. READ MORE ON FOOTBALL "He just reminds me of myself when I was a kid and he's very funny.” Ronnie was nicknamed “The Dude” by City fans and has since become the unofficial mascot for the team. And after their latest Premier League title in May, he was seen trying to open a bottle of champagne to the amusement of fans. He has a modelling contract and is on a talent group’s books despite only just starting school. Most read in Football

title: Trump was subject of apparent assassination attempt at Florida golf club – FBI
content: The former president was safe and unharmed after the US Secret Service opened fire at a man pointing an AK-style rifle into the club as Mr Trump was on the course, three law enforcement officials said. The person dropped the weapon and fled in an SUV, and was later taken into custody in a neighbouring county. The officials were not authorised to discuss the ongoing investigation and spoke to The Associated Press on condition of anonymity. pic.twitter.com/FHCmgRtebt — Team Trump (Text TRUMP to 88022) (@TeamTrump) September 15, 2024 An AK-style firearm was recovered at the scene near Trump International Golf Club West Palm Beach, two of the officials said. And no injuries were reported. The incident was the latest jarring moment in a campaign year marked by unprecedented upheaval. It occurred roughly two months after Mr Trump was shot during an assassination attempt at a rally in Pennsylvania, and a bullet grazed his ear. Only a week later, President Joe Biden withdrew from the race. The golf course was partially shut down for Mr Trump as he played, and agents were a few holes ahead of him when they noticed the person with the firearm, the officials said. There are several areas around the perimeter of the property where golfers are visible from the fence line. Secret Service agents and officers in golf carts and on ATVs generally secure the area several holes ahead and behind Mr Trump when he golfs. Agents also usually bring an armoured vehicle onto the course to quickly...

title: Chicago White Sox earn 1st series win, back-to-back victories since late June, defeating the Oakland A’s 4-3
creator: LaMond Pope
content: The Oakland Athletics appeared to have Luis Robert Jr. picked off when he took off for second base in the first inning on Sunday. But first baseman Tyler Soderstrom’s throw bounced off Robert’s back and went into left field. Robert raced to third base safely on the error. Later in the inning, Andrew Vaughn capped a nine-pitch at-bat with a bloop to right field for an RBI single. And Gavin Sheets followed with a two-run home run. The White Sox made the most of their opportunities, earning their first series victory since late June with a 4-3 win against the A’s in front of 18,017 at Guaranteed Rate Field. “If there’s one thing we’ve learned this season it’s you can’t take major-league wins for granted,” Sheets said. “To get back-to-back wins and get a series win, it feels really good. We have to enjoy these times, and we keep it going.” The Sox won consecutive games for the first time since three straight victories June 27-29, when they beat the Atlanta Braves once and the Colorado Rockies twice. They earned their first series win since taking two of three from the Rockies on June 28-30 at Guaranteed Rate Field. The Sox snapped a streak of 20 consecutive series losses . It’s their seventh series win of the season. At 35-115, the Sox need to go 8-4 in their final 12 games to avoid tying the 1962 New York Mets (40-120) for the most losses in a season during Major League Baseball’s modern era (since 1900). Chicago White Sox’s Gavin Sheets celebrates with third base coach Justin...

title: Latest Trump shooting incident a reminder of past assassination attempts against US leaders
creator: romulo
content: WASHINGTON: The FBI is investigating what it said was another assassination attempt on Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump. The incident occurred Sunday at the Trump International Golf Club West Palm Beach in Florida where Trump, the former president, was golfing. Law enforcement officials said Secret Service saw a man with a rifle in the bushes and shot at the suspected assassin. The suspect fled the bushes and was later apprehended on a highway, according to law enforcement. In July, Trump was shot by a gunman during a campaign rally in Pennsylvania in what the FBI said was an attempted assassination. The former president was wounded in the ear. The Congressional Research Service says direct assaults against presidents, presidents-elect, and candidates have occurred on at least 15 separate occasions, with five resulting in death. Below is a list of other previous attempts on the lives of American leaders, successful or not. Four US presidents were assassinated while in office. Abraham Lincoln: Killed in 1865 by John Wilkes Booth at Ford’s Theatre in Washington. James Garfield: Shot in 1881 in Washington at a train station and died of his wounds two and a half months later. William McKinley: Assassinated in 1901 by an anarchist in Buffalo, New York. John F. Kennedy: Assassinated by Lee Harvey Oswald in 1963 in Dallas, Texas, as the president rode in a motorcade. Four presidents were wounded but survived assassination attempts, while in office or afterwards....

title: Jon Rahm holds on to win LIV Golf and capture the season points list for $18 million bonus
content: BOLINGBROOK, Ill. -- Jon Rahm ended his first year in the LIV Golf League by closing with a 4-under 66 to win the final individual event Sunday and the season points title with its $18 million bonus. Rahm missed a pair of short birdie putts on the back nine that kept Joaquin Niemann and Sergio Garcia in the mix. But then he holed a 12-foot birdie putt on the 17th hole that gave him a three-shot going to the last at Bolingbrook Golf Course. Rahm won for the second time in the Saudi-funded league, adding to his title in England last month. In between those wins, he lost in a playoff to Brooks Koepka. Niemann, a two-time winner at the start of the season, was the only player who could have challenged Rahm for the season title. He opened with two early birdies but never could get ahead, closing within two shots after a birdie on the 15th and a big par save on the 16th. Niemann shot 66, while Garcia shot 68. They tied for second. “I wanted to do a good show and get it over the line. I'm really happy,” said Rahm, who said he was nervous on the practice range. “To go bogey-free on the weekend, it's quite spectacular. I'm very proud of the putt on the 17th, which made 18 a lot easier.” Crushers won the team title and will go to the team championship in the Dallas area next week that closes out the third season. Rahm, who finished at 11-under 199, won $4 million from the tournament and $18 million for capturing the season race. He was the biggest name to join the Saudi-backed league...

title: PM Modi virtually flags off six Vande Bharat trains in Ranchi
content: RANCHI: PM Narendra Modi on Sunday virtually flagged off six Vande Bharat trains for Jharkhand, Odisha, Bihar and Uttar Pradesh at Ranchi. Earlier, the PM was scheduled to flag off the trains from Tatanagar but his chopper could not take off from Ranchi airport due to poor visibility and inclement weather conditions. Union agriculture minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan and Jharkhand governor Santosh Kumar Gangwar were present at Tatanagar station on the occasion. The new trains will run on the Tatanagar-Patna, Brahmapur-Tatanagar, Rourkela-Howrah, Deoghar-Varanasi, Bhagalpur-Howrah and Gaya-Howrah routes. The trains will offer faster connectivity , PMO said. "Today every city and every state wants a Vande Bharat train to boost connectivity," Modi said. He underscored that the expansion of rail connectivity in the eastern states will strengthen the economy of the region and hugely benefit regular travellers, businesses, professionals and student communities. "Modern railway infrastructure is imperative to fast-paced development," he said.

title: Teatro de Miami desembarca en Mar del Plata con “Burdel el ojo azul”
creator: cRoldos
content: La compañía Ingenio Teatro , radicada en la ciudad de Miami, Estados Unidos, desde 2011 y formada por un elenco multicultural, llegará a Mar del Plata para poner en escena la obra “Burdel el ojo azul” . En una única función, se presentará el 28 de septiembre a las 21 en el escenario de Liberart (Moreno 2742). Escrita por la dramaturga cubana Raquel Carrio, quien integra el grupo desde sus inicios, el espectáculo tiene dirección de Lilliam Vega y sucede en un burdel “situado en algún lugar del mundo”, dijo a LA CAPITAL la directora. El burdel se cierra “porque ya no viene nadie y porque mataron a Angelina, la más pura, la más bella, la preferida de todos. ¿Quién la mató?”, es una de las preguntas de la pieza. “La respuesta a la pregunta lleva a tres mujeres, que ejercen la profesión más antigua del mundo, a confrontar sus historias ; en las cuales se entrecruzan anhelos, sueños frustrados, heridas y un desgarrador testimonio sobre lo que una ‘maldita circunstancia’ y la imposibilidad del amor pueden engendrar en el alma de una mujer”, indicó la sinopsis del espectáculo. Formado por artistas de diferentes lugares de América Latina y Europa , el grupo realiza funciones en castellano con subtítulos en inglés . No obstante, el público que asiste a sus obras es “mayoritariamente hispano”, inició Vega. Para la directora, el burdel es un espacio que le permite mostrar “la violencia y el maltrato” como “compañías inseparables de la venta del amor”. “Desde la...

title: Trump was the subject of an apparent assassination attempt at his Florida golf club, the FBI says
content: WASHINGTON — The man who authorities say pointed a rifle with a scope into former President Donald Trump’s golf club and was arrested is Ryan Wesley Routh, three law enforcement officials told The Associated Press. The officials identified the suspect to the AP but spoke on the condition of anonymity because they were not authorized to discuss the ongoing investigation. Secret Service agents shot at the suspect, who was taken into custody after fleeing the scene of what the FBI is calling an apparent attempted assassination of the Republican presidential nominee. Authorities are working to determine a motive. THIS IS A BREAKING NEWS UPDATE. AP’s earlier story follows below. The FBI said Donald Trump was the target of “what appears to be an attempted assassination” at his golf club in West Palm Beach, Florida, on Sunday, just nine weeks after the Republican presidential nominee survived another attempt on his life . The former president said he was safe and well. Palm Beach County Sheriff Ric Bradshaw said the U.S. Secret Service agents fired at a man pointing an AK-style rifle with a scope as Trump was on the course. Bradshaw said the gunman also had two backpacks hanging on a fence and a GoPro camera, and that he was about 400 yards to 500 yards away from Trump and hiding in shrubbery while the former president played golf on a nearby hole. The person dropped the weapon and fled in an SUV, and was later taken into custody in a neighboring county. The incident was the latest...

title: Steiermark holt Gold, Bronze und viele Auszeichnungen
creator: Markus Kropac
content: Verpasse nicht die neuesten Inhalte von diesem Profil: Melde dich an, um neue Inhalte von Profilen und Bezirken zu deinen hinzufügen zu können. STEIERMARK/LYON. Nach Monaten der intensiven Vorbereitung, vier knallharten Wettkampftagen und vielen emotionalen Momenten endete die 47. Austragung der WorldSkills in Lyon mit einer imposanten Abschlussfeier in der Groupama Arena am Stadtrand der französischen Metropole. Für die steirischen Teilnehmerinnen und Teilnehmer waren die Bewerbe wiederholt von Erfolg geprägt. Fliesenleger aus Aigen holte sich ex aequo mit dem dänischen Teilnehmer Gold. "Es ist unglaublich, ich war echt sprachlos", schildert Gruber seine Gefühlslage nach der Siegerehrung. "Dass sich ex aequo Gold ausgeht, hätte ich nicht gedacht", so der Ennstaler. Für seinen Experten Andreas Wieser war es die dritte Goldene in Folge, diesmal vielleicht noch schöner, arbeiten Gruber und Stiegler im selben Betrieb. Die Bad Blumauerin sorgte ebenfalls für Aufsehen, holte sie im Bewerb „Digital Construction“ höchst verdient Bronze. Gefragt waren in dieser Disziplin vor allem technisches Verständnis, Organisationstalent und ein kühler Kopf; ging es darum, Großbauprojekte zu planen und abzuwickeln. "Das kann man nicht beschreiben, was da passiert in diesem Moment", erzählte die strahlende Bronzemedaillengewinnerin. "Ich konnte zeigen was ich kann und es ist schön eine Medaille als Belohnung mit nach Hause zu nehmen", so Rath weiter. Expertin Larissa...

title: 하동군기자협회,lsquo;고향방문 귀성객 환영rsquo; 캠페인 가져
content: 경남 하동군기자협회 김성도 회장과 회원들이 15일 추석을 맞아 고향을 찾은 귀성객들에게 ‘고향방문 귀성객 환영행사’ 캠페인을 펼쳐 지역민의 귀감이 되고 있다. 하동군기자협은 추석을 맞아 하동역과 시외버스터미널에서 귀성객을 대상으로 고향을 찾는 귀성객을 환영하는 현수막을 각 읍·면에 게시하고 출향민들에게 홍보와 환영의 덕담을 통해 푸근한 고향의 정을 전했다. ‘고향방문 귀성객 환영행사’는 한국남부발전(주) 하동빛드림본부의 후원과 하동군기자협회의 주관으로 3년차 연차사업으로 진행됐다. 이번 ‘고향방문 귀성객 환영행사’는 한전의 어려운 사정에도 지역의 협력과 하동군기자협회의 좋은 홍보와 함께 고향을 찾은 귀성객들에게 고향에 대한 자긍심을 느끼도록 했다. 김성도 하동군기자협회장은 “지역사회 발전을 위한 우리 기자들이 사회적 의무와 언론의 책임을 다하고 아름답고 행복한 하동을 만들어 나 가는데 노력을 다하겠다”고 말했다. 하동군기자협회는 지난 20010년에 17개사 18명의 회원으로 발대식으로 13년의 역사를 가지고 지역의 참 언론인의 모범이 되고있다.

title: Polícia resgata criança que está sob guarda provisória e foi raptada pelos pais biológicos no interior de SP
content: As investigações foram realizadas pelas equipes de Itajobi e Novo Horizonte (SP), em parceria com os policiais de Embu das Artes. Segundo a polícia, a menina estava com os pais biológicos em um acampamento de ciganos. O pai foi preso em flagrante por subtraí-la das mãos da cuidadora e encaminhado à Cadeia de Carapicuíba (SP). O delegado responsável pelas investigações, Walmir Baldo, explicou que ao que a mãe vai responder em liberdade: Após o resgate, a criança foi devolvida à cuidadora que detém a guarda provisória. Raptada O caso ocorreu no sábado (7), em Itajobi (SP). Walmir Baldo, explicou que, após apresentar ferimentos, a menina foi retirada dos pais, em 2021. Diante dessa situação, a mulher que já atuava como cuidadora da criança pediu a guarda provisória e a Justiça concedeu. Depois disso, somente a mãe foi autorizada a fazer visitas assistidas. O pai estava impedido de se aproximar da criança. De acordo com o boletim de ocorrência, no sábado, a cuidadora e a criança estavam em casa quando a mãe biológica chegou para fazer uma visita assistida, acompanhada do pai. Ela disse aos policiais que, em determinado momento, a mãe a empurrou e pegou a criança. Ao tentar resgatar a menina, a cuidadora foi surpreendida pelo pai biológico, que sacou um revólver da cintura e deu algumas coronhadas na cabeça dela. A mulher também foi ameaçada de morte. A briga continuou até que os pais biológicos conseguiram colocar a criança dentro do...

title: "선수들은 오죽하겠나"...9월 중순 식지 않는 무더위, 폭염주의보까지 떴다, 오후 2시 경기에 사령탑도 선수도 한 마디 [MD인천]
content: [마이데일리 = 인천 김건호 기자] "뛰고 있는 선수들은 오죽하겠나." SSG 랜더스 이숭용 감독이 오후 2시 경기에 대한 이야기를 하던 중 나온 말이다. KBO리그는 지난 9월 1일부터 일요일 및 공휴일에 오후 2시에 경기를 개시한다. 또한 지상파 TV 중계에 따라 토요일 경기를 오후 5시가 아닌 오후 2시에 개시할 때도 있다. 문제는 날씨다. 9월 중순이지만, 더위가 식을 줄 모른다. 14일 부산 사직구장에서 열린 롯데 자이언츠와 한화 이글스의 경기에서는 관중들 중 온열 환자가 발생하기도 했다. 기상청에 따르면 15일 인천 SSG랜더스필드에서 열린 SSG와 삼성 라이온즈의 경기가 시작된 2시께 경기장의 기온은 31.9도였다. 체감 온도는 32.7도. 이날 인천에는 폭염주의보가 발령됐다. 이숭용 감독은 "지금 9월이라고는 하지만 여름 날씨다. 너무 힘들다. 어제(14일) (이)지영이 인터뷰를 봤는데, '쓰러질 것 같다'고 했더라. 진짜 그늘이 없으면 힘들 것 같다"며 "하다못해 우리가 더그아웃 앞에서 야구를 보는 데도 뜨거울 정도인데, 뛰고 있는 선수들은 오죽하겠나"라고 말했다. 시즌 막판 치열한 순위 경쟁 중인 KBO리그는 추석 연휴를 맞아 계속해서 오후 2시 경기가 예정돼 있다. 추석 연휴 마지막 날인 18일까지 오후 2시 경기가 계속해서 열린다. 이숭용 감독은 "일정이 나와 결정된 상황이지만, 상황에 따라서는 여러 방면으로 고민을 하고 방법을 찾았으면 한다. 6월부터 9월까지 여름 날씨가 몇 개월 가고 있다. 부산 경기에서도 팬분들 중 온열...

title: 미국 7년만에 솔하임컵 우승, 싱글 매치플레이서 패했으나 15.5-12.5로 유럽 제압
content: [마이데일리 = 김진성 기자] 미국 여자골프가 2017년 이후 7년만에 솔하임컵서 웃었다. 미국은 16일(이하 한국시각) 미국 버지니아주 게인즈빌 로버트 트렌트 존스 골프클럽(파72, 7500야드)에서 열린 2024 솔하임컵 마지막날 싱글 매치플레이서 유럽에 4승3무5패(5.5-6.5)로 밀렸다. 그러나 최종 스코어 15.5-12.5로 유럽을 제압했다. 2017년 대회 이후 7년만에 우승했다. 솔하임컵은 미국과 유럽의 여자골프 대항전이다. 2년에 한번씩 치르지만, 이번 대회는 작년에 이어 2년 연속 열렸다. 첫 날과 둘째 날은 포볼과 포섬으로 진행했다. 첫 날은 미국의 6-2 우세, 둘째 날은 4-4로 팽팽했다. 미국은 마지막 날 싱글매치플레이서 메간 강이 에밀리 피더슨을 5홀 남기고 6홀 차로, 엘리슨 쿠퍼즈가 안나 노르드브비스트를 3홀 남기고 4홀 차로, 로즈 창이 카를로타 시간다를 4홀 남기고 6홀 차로, 제니커 컵쵸가 린 그란트를 1홀 남기고 2홀 차로 각각 눌렀다. 김진성 기자 - c마이데일리( ). 무단전재&재배포 금지 -

title: 박민영 '164cm·37kg' 몸무게 유지하나...청순한데 핫한 슬렌더 자태
content: [마이데일리 = 김지우 기자] 배우 박민영이 아름다운 미모를 자랑했다. 최근 박민영은 개인 SNS에 "드디어 '이윽고' 영접"이라는 글과 함께 사진을 올렸다. 사진 속 박민영은 한 콘서트장에 방문했다. 검은 슬리브리스 상의를 착용한 박민영은 한눈에 봐도 마른 몸매로 눈길을 끌었다. 박민영은 청순한 이목구비와 핫한 패션으로 콘서트장의 주인공 같은 비주얼을 뽐냈다. 누리꾼들은 "너무 예뻐요" "즐거운 시간 보내세요" "행복한 찐 웃음이다" "늘씬늘씬" "추석에 맛있는 거 많이 드세요"라며 다양한 댓글을 남겼다. 한편, 박민영은 올 상반기 방송된 tvN 드라마 '내 남편과 결혼해줘' 촬영 당시 37kg까지 체중을 감량했다고 해 화제를 모았다. 김지우 기자 - c마이데일리( ). 무단전재&재배포 금지 -

title: Violent crime up in bustling NYC tourist hub — no matter how Mayor Adams spins it
creator: Carl Campanile, Valentina Jaramillo, Jorge Fitz-Gibbon
content: Violent crime is spiking in the Big Apple’s busiest tourist hub — even as Mayor Eric Adams is set to deliver a State of the City speech raving about how much safer the five boroughs are. NYPD crime stats show that as of Sept. 8 compared to the same period in 2023, robberies have soared more than 90% and felony assaults jumped nearly 73% in the Manhattan North Precinct — which covers tourist magnets like Radio City Music Hall, Rockefeller Plaza, the Theater District and St. Patrick’s Cathedral. Burglaries also jumped 58%, while the precinct has handled three murders — one more than last year over the same span — and two more rapes, from seven last year to nine this year. “Society is a mess, and all we can do is pray,” a security guard working at Eighth Avenue and West 47th Street told The Post on Sunday. “Every day there’s something, whether it’s drugs or the homeless,” the worker said. A local said neighborhood vagrants can be particularly troublesome. “They’re disturbing people that live in the building,” the source said. “They block the stairs. We don’t let them stay, so we have to tell them to leave. That’s why [security] are here.” The Manhattan North stats are in contrast to citywide figures for the same period, which show an overall 2.5% drop in crime in the five boroughs, including a nearly 13% dip in murder. “This is a beautiful block, the problems come in waves, and when they do, we bring attention to it, and it gets fixed,” said a 55-year-old local, who gave his...

title: Kamala Harris to Attend Los Angeles Fundraiser on Sept. 29
creator: Gmaddaus
content: Kamala Harris will make a fundraising visit to Los Angeles on Sept. 29, according to an invitation issued by the Harris Victory Fund. Tickets to the event, billed as “An Afternoon with Vice President Kamala Harris,” start at $500 and go up to $1 million. Those who donate at least $100,000 can get in line for a photo with Harris, while those at the $250,000 level and above can attend a “liberty luncheon.” Harris has not been to L.A. for a fundraiser since Joe Biden bowed out of the race eight weeks ago. The last major L.A. fundraiser was June 15 at the Peacock Theater, which raised nearly $30 million for Biden. Harris raised $361 million in August. Former President Donald Trump raised $130 million over the same period. The Harris campaign also reported receiving $47 million in the 24-hour period following Tuesday’s debate. Harris and her allied political action committee have reserved more than $300 million in ad time over the last two months of the campaign, more than double the TV ad spending by Trump and his PAC, according to AdImpact data. Several other Harris-Walz fundraising events are expected to be held around L.A. on Oct. 5, though not with Harris present. Harris attended a fundraiser on Saturday at the Washington Hilton, which included Common and California Sen. Laphonza Butler among the speakers, according to a pool report. She expected to campaign this week in Pennsylvania, Michigan and Wisconsin. Among her upcoming events is a “Unite for America” livestream with...

title: [단독] '이용식 눈물 펑펑' 원혁❤️이수민 부모 된다...결혼 5개월만 임신
content: [마이데일리 = 김도형 기자] 개그맨 이용식이 추석 명절에 최고의 선물을 받았다. 원혁 이수민 부부에게 새 생명이 찾아왔다. 한 방송 관계자는 16일 마이데일리에 "원혁 이수민 부부가 임신했다"라면서 "극초기를 지나 안정기에 접어들고 있어서 몸 관리에 각별히 신경 쓰고 있다"라고 했다. 원혁 이수민 부부는 지난 4월 2일 화촉을 밝혔으며, 결혼 5개월 만에 임신 소식을 전하게 됐다. 내년 상반기 출산 예정인 것으로 전해진다. 특별히 이 소식에 그 누구보다 이수민의 아버지인 이용식이 눈물을 흘리며 크게 기뻐했다는 후문이다. 이는 지난 9일 방송된 TV조선 예능 프로그램 '조선의 사랑꾼' 방송 말미에 공개된 예고편에서도 목격됐다. 영상에서 원혁 이수민 부부는 제작진에게 긴급 호출을 보냈다. 제작진은 "저희를 부른 이유가 뭐예요?"라고 물었고, 이수민은 "오빠가 이야기해"라며 긴장한 모습을 보였다. 그 뒤로 이용식의 오열 장면이 나오면서 시청자들의 궁금증을 유발했는데, 눈물의 의미가 밝혀진 것이다. 원혁 이수민 부부는 임신 소식과 관련한 촬영을 이미 마친 상태다. 오는 23일 방송되는 '조선의 사랑꾼'을 통해 그 자세한 이야기가 공개될 것으로 보인다. 한편, 뮤지컬 배우인 원혁은 지난 2022년 방송된 TV조선 예능 프로그램 '미스터트롯2'에 출연한 뒤 트로트 가수로도 활동 중이다. 이수민은 개그맨 이용식의 딸로 다수의 예능 프로그램에 출연해 시청자들과 만났다. 두 사람은 지난 2022년 12월부터 공개 연애를 시작했다....

title: Martha Stewart reveals who she is voting for with rare presidential endorsement
content: Martha Stewart reveals who she is voting for with rare presidential endorsement READ MORE: Trump tears into Taylor Swift in blazing Truth Social rage posting By James Gordon For Dailymail.com Published: 23:42, 15 September 2024 | Updated: 23:46, 15 September 2024 e-mail View comments Martha Stewart has finally revealed who she will be voting for in this November's presidential election . Speaking during the 2024 Retail Influencer CEO Forum earlier this week, the TV star said she would be voting for Kamala Harris . Stewart, 83, gave her reasoning as to why she is supporting Harris because she wants a president 'who doesn't hate New York' and 'doesn't hate democracy.' The star has long been critical of Trump since both the pair had competing versions of The Apprentice back in 2006. It was Trump's version that eventually won out with Stewart's version the victim of low ratings. Martha Stewart has finally revealed who she will be voting for in this November's election Stewart said she would be voting for Kamala Harris because she wants a president 'who doesn't hate New York' and 'doesn't hate democracy.' At the time, she suggested Trump had agreed to be 'fired' so that only her version of the show would remain. 'Having two Apprentices was as unfair to him as it was unfair to me,' she said to CBS New s at the time. Trump disputed her telling of the tale and called her out in public with a letter telling the press, 'I wish she would be able to take responsibility for her failure.'...

title: Сенатор Грэм* рассказал о хорошем настроении Трампа после покушения на него
creator: (Кирилл Громов)
content: Кандидат в президенты США Дональд Трамп остается в хорошем расположении духа после попытки покушения на него во Флориде. Об этом рассказал однопартиец экс президента и американский сенатор от штата Южная Каролина Линдси Грэм*. Он добавил, что после произошедшего связался с политиком. — Он один из самых сильных людей, которых я знаю. Он в хорошем расположении духа и как никогда полон решимости спасти нашу страну, — цитирует сенатора РБК . О покушении на Дональда Трампа в воскресенье, 15 сентября, сообщила член палаты представителей Конгресса, республиканка Марджори Тейлор-Грин. В то же время New York Post уточнил, что выстрелы прогремели возле гольф-клуба Трампа. По данным СМИ, два человека целились друг в друга, при этом их стрельба не была адресована политику. Позднее штаб Трампа подтвердил информацию о стрельбе, произошедшей недалеко от гольф-клуба в Уэст-Палм-Бич, штат Флорида, где находился кандидат в президенты США. В Белом добавили, что действующий глава США Джо Байден следит за ситуацией. Дональд Трамп-младший также поделился информацией о ЧП. Секретная служба США занимается расследованием инцидента . Власти США расценивают стрельбу рядом с Трампом как попытку покушения . Сам политик после инцидента сообщил, что цел и невредим . Он также добавил, что не перестанет бороться. До этого громкое покушение на Трампа произошло 14 июля во время предвыборного митинга в городе Батлер, штат Пенсильвания. «Вечерняя Москва» выяснила подробности происшествия. После...

title: Nothing fancy, just the basics: In protest season, shopping habit changes in malls
content: Kolkata: On Friday evening, Sreemoye and Ranjan Sen went to South City mall to buy clothes for their parents and daughter. They had been meaning to do it for three weeks, but had postponed it every weekend until they realised it didn't make sense to wait any more. But, unlike other years, when it becomes a fun day out with the family and ushers in the puja mood, they came alone, just bought whatever they needed to buy, and left for home. The Sens' behaviour reflects the mood of shoppers stepping into malls across the city. With just three weeks to go for Bengal's biggest festival, apparel retailers are doing business but cinemas and restaurants are not. After low footfall in the past month, usually the busiest time in other years, customer count increased this week, with retailers and mall operators expecting a good weekend turnout. But, with the general mood in the city that of unease because of the impasse between junior doctors and govt, people are shying away from entertainment. Homemaker Mahesweta Sil, too, purchased new clothes for her children. "It was a purchase like every year. But the joy and enthusiasm was missing," she said. Mall operators in the city said the average time spent by customers in the mall had almost halved, compared to the corresponding period last year. "With people not interested in watching movies or eating out, they are spending a lot less time than they usually do," said Ramesh Pandey, whole-time director at Ambuja Neotia, which operates City...

title: توقعات الأبراج اليوم الأثنين 16 سبتمبر / أيلول 2024
content: قد تضطر إلى اتخاذ بعض القرارات الصعبة في هذا الوقت، أو اليوم قد يكون مثاليًا للبدء في برنامج جديد لتحقيق الوفرة والازدهار.. هذا ما تخبر به الأبراج بعض الأشخاص اليوم. فماذا يخبئ لك الفلك اليوم؟ ما هي توقعات برجك حول جوانب حياتك المختلفة؟ تابع قراءة السطور التالية. توقعات اليوم اليوم قد يكون مثاليًا للبدء في برنامج جديد لتحقيق الوفرة والازدهار. إذا كنت تشعر بالحيرة بشأن مشروع جديد كرست له قدرًا كبيرًا من التفكير، فقد يكون هذا هو الوقت المثالي للقيام بخطوة عملية. توقعات برج الحمل اليوم في الحب قد تحدث مشاجرات بسيطة اليوم مع شريكك. حاول ألا تغضب أو تدخل في أي جدال معه، لأن المشكلات قد تتفاقم الآن بسهولة، عليك تجنب المواجهات اليوم. توقعات برج الحمل اليوم في العمل قد تكون لديك بداية جديدة وجيدة في حياتك المهنية اليوم. قد تحصل حتى على فرص للانتقال من صاحب عمل إلى آخر يقدم لك آفاقًا أفضل بكثير لتطوير حياتك المهنية. توقعات برج الحمل اليوم في الصحة قد تُعاني الآن من مشاكل تتعلق بالجلد والأسنان. عليك أن تتأكد من تناول الكثير من الفواكه والخضروات والحليب ومنتجات الألبان في نظامك الغذائي. النظام الغذائي السليم وممارسة الرياضة ضروريان للحفاظ على صحتك وجمالك. توقعات برج الثور اليوم رُبما يكون ترددك قد خلق فوضى لا داعي لها من حولك، من المرجح الآن أن تصل كل القضايا والمشكلات التي كنت تواجهها خلال الفترة الماضية إلى ذروتها، حاول أن تتعامل بهدوء. توقعات برج الثور اليوم في الحب من المرجح أن يكون شريكك واقعًا تحت ضغط كبير اليوم، قد تحتاج إلى تقديم كل تعاطفك وتفهمك. يجب أن تدرك أن الاستجابة العاطفية للانفعالات لن تؤدي إلا إلى تعقيد الموقف. توقعات برج الثور اليوم...

title: Selena Gomez Sparkles in a Silver-Trimmed Black Halter Gown at the Emmys
creator: Elle
content: ’s Selena Gomez at the Toronto International Film Festival, made , and now she is in Los Angeles for the Emmys. The Best Actress in a Comedy Series nominee walked the red carpet wearing a silver-trimmed black halter gown. Big diamond dangle earrings and jewelry completed the look. Her boyfriend, , didn’t join her on the red carpet. This is . She is also part of the group included in ’s Outstanding Comedy Series nomination for her work producing the show. Regardless of whether or not Gomez wins, the actress will take the stage at the Emmys to present as well. Gomez has a big awards season ahead of her though, as her upcoming film has already generated awards show buzz. Gomez was part of the group who won the Best Actress award at the Cannes Film Festival in May. She shares the honor with her co-stars Zoe Saldaña, Karla Sofia Gascón, and Adriana Paz. While the film is a musical, and Gomez also sings, she has prioritized her acting career in the last few years. She told earlier this month that her next album may be a ways off. “I don’t know if I’m ready, you know, [to release one]?” she said. “It’s a vulnerable space. Acting has always been my first love. Music is just a hobby that went out of control. Now it is a part of who I am, so I don’t think I’m going anywhere. I’m just not ready yet.”

title: 'Nunca vou me render', diz Trump após possível novo atentado
content: O candidato republicano à Presidência dos Estados Unidos, Donald Trump, afirmou, neste domingo (15), que está bem após os tiros disparados próximos a um clube de golfe em que ele estava. Ele não foi ferido. "Tiros em minha vizinhança, mas antes que os rumores comecem a se espalhar, eu queria que vocês soubessem primeiro: ESTOU SEGURO E BEM!". "Nada vai me atrasar. EU NUNCA VOU ME RENDER!", escreveu Trump, em e-mail enviado para a lista de arrecadação de recursos para a campanha, segundo a imprensa estadunidense. Alvo de um atentado em julho , Trump teve de ser retirado às pressas após a troca de tiros neste domingo (15), de acordo com comunicado divulgado pela campanha do Partido Republicano . O FBI, a polícia federal americana, apura nova tentativa de assassinato contra o ex-presidente. Um suspeito foi detido. O filho do republicano, Donald Trump Jr., escreveu na rede social X que uma arma automática AK-47 foi encontrada próximo ao local. "O FBI respondeu a um incidente em West Palm Beach, na Flórida, e está investigando o que parece ser uma tentativa de assassinato contra o ex-presidente Trump", disse o órgão em comunicado. O incidente ocorreu do lado de fora do Trump International Golf Course, em West Palm Beach, onde o republicano estava jogando golfe durante um dia de pausa na campanha presidencial , segundo a imprensa americana. O local fica próximo à sua residência em Mar-a-Lago. Autoridades policiais disseram durante uma coletiva de imprensa que...

title: Le député Willy Mishiki plaide pour l'intégration des Wazalendo dans les services de sécurité
content: Le député national Willy Mishiki soutient l'incorporation des combattants Wazalendo dans les Forces armées de la République démocratique du Congo (FARDC), la police nationale, et les services de renseignements. Lors d'un point de presse tenu ce samedi 14 septembre à Kinshasa, l'élu de Walikale, au Nord-Kivu, explique que cette intégration sous un commandement unique et harmonisé pourrait réduire les abus commis par certains membres de ces groupes armés, et contribuer à rétablir la paix dans certaines régions de l'Est du pays. Willy Mishiki a également recommandé au gouvernement de fournir rapidement une formation accélérée en droit humanitaire international et en droits de l'homme aux Wazalendo. Il a déclaré : « Nous pensons qu'il faut incorporer les Wazalendo dans les FARDC et la PNC, avoir un commandement unique, et là, on ne va plus parler de Volontaires pour la défense de patrie. Mais on va parler des FARDC. Et cela va nous éviter les dérapages que nous connaissons aujourd'hui. L'avantage que les Wazalendo ont, c'est qu'ils sont déjà formés militairement, ils se battent pour conserver les terres de leurs ancêtres et ils ont résisté et tout ce qu'il faut maintenant, c'est leur donner la formation accélérée de droit humanitaire international et des droits de l'homme qui doivent être respectés. Aujourd'hui par exemple, les Wazalendo ne sont pas payés, ils se font payer eux-mêmes à travers les jetons qu'ils récoltent. » Les Wazalendo...

title: Nord-Kivu : grève sèche du personnel de l'OVG
content: Les agents de l’Observatoire volcanologique de Goma "OVG" ont entamé depuis vendredi 13 septembre une grève sèche. Les grévistes réclament leur prime spécifique, non payée depuis neuf mois par le ministère de la Recherche scientifique. Cette prime leur avait été accordée par le président de la République, Félix Tshisekedi, lors de passage à Goma après l’éruption du volcan Nyiragongo, le 22 mai 2021. Du coup, les volcanologues n’ont plus accès aux données de surveillance des volcans, notamment les volcans Nyiragongo et Nyamulagira. Le directeur général de l’OVG, Georges Mavonga Tuluka, affirme que cette prime n’est plus payée depuis neuf mois pour des raisons diverses, notamment la nomination de la nouvelle Première ministre. Ces agents, qui déjà observé un mouvement de grève partielle, ont décidé de durcir leur mouvement. Même le comité de gestion a été forcé de se mettre en grève par les agents en colère, témoigne Georges Mavonga : "L’OVG est fermé. Même le comité de gestion n’est pas censé entrer en grève, mais on nous force d’aller en grève et rester à la maison. Le comité de gestion pouvait faire quelque chose, voir si les machines tournent, voir aussi ce qui arrive automatiquement. Maintenant, ils ne savent plus faire ça". En réaction, le maire de Goma, Faustin Kapend Kamand, demande au DG de l’OVG d’observer un service minimum ; en attendant une réponse favorable des autorités au niveau national. Il exhorte ainsi les...

title: Ordonnance présidentielle : deux nouvelles missions diplomatiques ajoutées à l’actuel ambassadeur congolais en Russie
content: Deux nouvelles missions diplomatiques ont été ajoutées à l’actuel ambassadeur de la République démocratique du Congo accrédité auprès de la Fédération de Russie, au terme de deux ordonnances présidentielles lues samedi soir 14 septembre 2024 à la télévision nationale (RTNC). « M. Ivan Vangu Ngimbi a été nommé ambassadeur extraordinaire et plénipotentiaire de la République démocratique du Congo auprès de la République d’Azerbaïdjan et de la Géorgie, au terme d’ordonnances présidentielles », a-t-on lu dans ces ordonnances. « Le précité bénéficiera de toutes les indemnités et avantages reconnus à ces fonctions selon les prescrits de l’ordonnance portant règlement et administration des corps des diplomates en RDC », a ajouté la source. Ivan Vangu Ngimbi, ambassadeur de la République démocratique du Congo en Russie depuis juin 2022, représente désormais la RDC auprès de ces trois pays. Lors de sa prise de fonction à Moscou, ce diplomate congolais avait placé son mandat sous le signe du renforcement de la dynamique insufflée à Sotchi, en octobre 2019, par le président de la République, Félix Antoine Tshisekedi Tshilombo, lors de sa participation au 1er Sommet Russie-Afrique. Lors de sa prise de fonction à Moscou, il avait promis au personnel diplomatique et d’appoint, content de son affectation après de longs mois de sacrifices, de mettre à profit son expertise avérée sur les questions internationales pour donner un nouvel élan...

The Die Hard star appeared relaxed amid the daytime trek in Southern California . It came a few days after Moore, 61, updated fans on her ex-spouse's health during a Friday appearance on The Drew Barrymore Show, saying that 'given the givens, he is in a stable place.' title: «موديز»: نمو وجودة بأصول البنوك القطرية
creator: Qatar Tribune
content: نوهت وكالة موديز العالمية للتصنيف الائتماني بما تتمتع به البنوك القطرية من نمو وجودة في الأصول، وقدرة كبيرة على مواجهة كافة التحديات، في ظل امتلاكها لنسب تغطية عالية للسيولة، إضافة إلى جذبها لتدفقات مالية مهمة عبر الودائع المتنوعة. وفي هذا الصدد، ذكرت وكالة موديز للتصنيف الائتماني في تقريرها أنه تم تمويل البنوك القطرية في المقام الأول خلال الفترة الماضية عبر ودائع العملاء التي شكلت نحو 52 % من إجمالي الأصول وذلك بنهاية شهر يونيو 2024، مع تأكيدها على المستوى المرتفع من الودائع الحكوميّة والكيانات التابعة لها، حيث تقدّر تلك الودائع بنحو 36 % من إجمالي الودائع بنهاية شهر يونيو من العام الجاري. كما أشادت وكالة موديز بنجاح البنوك القطرية في تنمية وجذب الودائع المتأتية من القطاع الخاص المحلي مع استقطابها كذلك للودائع الأجنبية والدولية. وتطرّقت وكالة موديز إلى النمو الذي يشهده قطاع الائتمان والذي يتماشى مع مسيرة النمو الاقتصادي للدولة، وتحديدًا الائتمان الموجه للقطاع الخاص الذي يتوقع له أن ينمو بشكل ملحوظ خلال العام الجاري بما يعكس استمرار تنفيذ المشاريع الكبرى في الدولة. وفي هذا الإطار فقد توقعت وكالة موديز أن يحقق ائتمان القطاع الخاص نموًا خلال العام الجاري بنسبة تتراوح بين 3 % و 4 %، مشددةً في ذات الصدد على انخفاض المخاطر المرتبطة بالائتمان لدى البنوك القطرية، حيث قالت الوكالة إن البنوك القطرية نجحت في تخفيف مخاطر الصدمات غير المتوقعة نتيجة حجم القروض والائتمان مع قدرتها على مواجهة التحديات المرتبطة به، خاصة أن الجزء الكبير منه موجه للقطاع العام وهو ما يعني انخفاض نسبة مخاطر تعثر الائتمان بشكل كبير. وأوضحت وكالة موديز للتصنيف الائتماني الدور...

title: Trujillo: familiares de empresario asesinado a tiros denuncian meses de amenazas y ataques de criminales
content: Alberto Fujimori . Premios Emmy . Alianza Lima vs Mannucci . Incendios forestales . Fonavi . Dólar en Perú . Ley Soto . Metro de Lima . Horóscopo . Dolar BCV . DolarToday . ÚLTIMAS NOTICIAS POLÍTICA ECONOMÍA SOCIEDAD MUNDO PERÚ DEPORTES ESPECTÁCULOS CINE Y SERIES DÓLAR SUSCRÍBETE Últimas Noticias La familia del empresario asesinado el reciente sábado señala que la Policía en Trujillo no hizo caso a su pedido de protección y, por el contrario, les dijeron que contacten con un 'vago'. La Libertad. Durante varios meses, los familiares de Gianfranco Horna Carrasco, empresario que murió acribillado por delincuentes, fueron víctimas de constantes amenazas y ataques por parte de presuntos extorsionadores que exigían el pago de cupos para no atentar contra su negocio, una cevichería ubicada en el distrito de La Esperanza, en la ciudad de Trujillo . Pese a las denuncias interpuestas ante la Policía Nacional, los familiares denuncian que nunca recibieron la protección necesaria cuando acudieron a la PNP y, por el contrario, les dijeron que se busquen un vago. "Arreglen porque con nosotros no se va a solucionar, péguense a un vago que ellos lo van a solucionar", afirmó un allegado de el joven Horna. La familia señala que procedió a "arreglar", pero meses después les volvieron a dinamitar la vivienda de su familia, hecho que los alarmó. Los criminales no solo amenazaron, sino que también llegaron a disparar y colocar explosivos en los locales de la familia,...

title: الفهود في ضيافة الاستقلال الإيراني
creator: عوض الكباشي
content: يحل فريق كرة القدم الأول بالغرافة ضيفا على فريق الاستقلال الإيراني لحساب دور المجموعات بدوري أبطال آسيا لكرة القدم في الجولة الأولى من البطولة في اللقاء الذي يجمعهما بالعاصمة الإيرانية طهران عند التاسعة والنصف مساء اليوم بتوقيت الدوحة. ووصل الغرافة ثالث النسخة السابقة من الدوري إلى هذه المرحلة بعد أن تجاوز شباب الأهلي الإماراتي في الملحق بهدف دون رد، ليتأهل لبطولة النخبة، لكنه لم يظهر بالصورة المأمولة في النسخة الجديدة من الدوري القطري دوري نجوم أريد إذ اكتفى بانتصار وحيد وخسارة وتعادلين، كان آخرهما أمام الشمال بهدف لمثله يوم الجمعة في الجولة الرابعة. ويعمل فريق الغرافة بقيادة جهازه الفني واللاعبين على تقديم أفضل المستويات الفنية في اول المشوار حيث يلعب الغرافة على ملعبه كل من العين والوصل الإماراتيين، وباختاكور الأوزبكي، والنصر السعودي، فيما سيلتقي خارج أرضه مع بيرسبوليس والاستقلال الإيرانيين، والأهلي والهلال السعوديين.. وتعاقد الفهود مع عدد من اللاعبين المحترفين لتعزيز صفوفه قبل المشاركة القارية على غرار الإسباني خوسيلو لاعب ريال مدريد الإسباني السابق، والروماني فلورين كومان، إلى جانب الإسباني رودريغو مورينو قادما من الريان، فيما أبقى على عدد من لاعبيه من الموسم الماضي أمثال التونسي فرجاني ساسي والجزائري ياسين إبراهيمي الغائب عن الظهور في دوري أبطال آسيا للنخبة بعدما غاب عن منافسات الدوري. مواجهة صعبة تنتظر الغرافة في لقاء الاستقلال بطل الدوري الإيراني تسع مرات من قبل، والذي يسجل ظهوره الثالث عشر على المستوى القاري، والأول منذ عام 2021. وسيسعى الفهود من أجل ظهور مختلف عكس المستوى الذي ظهر به في مباراة الشمال والتي انتهت بالتعادل...

title: La Moncloa está lejos
creator: José Luis Díaz López
content: En el ámbito de la política exterior de España, concretamente en las relaciones internacionales, también con la Unión Europea y respecto de la migración, el Partido Popular no renuncia a aplicar acciones negativas que rompen consensos básicos en beneficio de nuestro país; y además, lo hace alejándose de planteamientos racionales. Esta borágine destructiva, del principal partido de la oposición, no respeta en muchos casos los intereses de la ciudadanía española. LA DESLEALTAD NO LLEVA A LA MONCLOA Sin duda, estas posiciones miden el bajo nivel de Feijó como aspirante a hacer realidad su sueño, de llegar a ser inquilino de La Moncloa. Ese deseo, lo hemos visto reflejado en la reunión que mantuvo con las baronías peperas, que presiden las comunidades autónomas en las que gobiernan, con la elección de un escenario que e se parecía a la sede de la Presidencia española. Con estas imposturas que acostumbra a practicar, se produce una autodevaluacion de quién se ofrece como alternativa. Es bueno recordar alguno de los desaciertos chabacanos protagonizados por el mandatario del PP, como el acontecido en la primavera del pasado año, cuando criticó desde Elche la ausencia de Pedro Sánchez, en la inauguración de una exposición de siete figuras de Guerreros de Xi'an, en el Museo Arqueológico Provincial, cuando el presidente del Gobierno en ese momento, se encontraba en China reunido con Xi Jinping. Feijóo llegó a decir - quedándose tan ancho- que esperaba...

title: Hosts Dan Levy and Eugene Levy Are Father-Son Goals at 2024 Emmys
content: Yes, David! In ultimate father-son fashion, 2024 Emmys hosts Dan Levy and Eugene Levy wowed on the red carpet at the Peacock Theater in Los Angeles ahead of the annual award show on Sept. 15. ( See more stars on the Emmys red carpet .) The Schitts Creek stars looked chic as they coordinated their ensembles as cohosts of the television event. True to form, Dan, 41, pushed fashion boundaries in fitted black pants and a jacket with a white satin top that had a daring flared neckline. Of course, Eugene, 77, strutted his stuff in a double breasted suit, pale blue tie, circular classes, and his siganture eyebrows. In addition to hosting the evening’s festivities, Eugene was also nominated for his hosting role on his travel series, The Reluctant Traveler . ( My Next Guest With David Letterman And John Mulaney ultimately took home the prize at the Creative Arts Emmys the previous weekend.) The Levys are no strangers to the Emmys. In fact, they share eight of the trophies amongst themselves thanks, in part, to their hit family comedy Schitt’s Creek, which they created together. Triple threat Dan, who played David Rose on the show, won Emmys for starring, writing, and directing the hit series, which ran from 2015 to 2020, while Eugene picked up wins of his own for playing patriarch Johnny Rose. On a potential return to the beloved series, Dan has previously expressed an openness to the idea, though there’s nothing currently in the works. "I love the fact that people want more," Dan...

title: Bomberos de La Paz refuerzan el combate contra los incendios forestales en Concepción
creator: jsagarnaga@presidencia.gob.bo (Gloria Mamani Mamani)
content: Santa Cruz, 15 de septiembre de 2024 (ABI). – Un nuevo contingente de bomberos de La Paz llegó hasta el municipio cruceño de Concepción para reforzar el combate contra los incendios forestales que aquejan a la región del oriente, informó este domingo el ministro de Gobierno, Eduardo del Castillo. “¡Reforzamos la lucha contra los incendios! ¡No nos detenemos! Se informa a la población que personal de bomberos que llegó a Santa Cruz desde La Paz, arribó a la comunidad Zapoco a 67 kilómetros del municipio de Concepción”, publicó la autoridad en sus redes sociales. Este nuevo contingente apoyará a los bomberos que están en el lugar, además de colaborar a las personas que se encontraban en la localidad con acciones prehospitalarias. El pasado sábado, en el mismo municipio, la policía forestal rescató a una paraba barba negra que huía de los incendios forestales. GMM/MC

title: Estos dos objetos podrían aumentar la velocidad del Internet en tu casa si los colocas detrás del router
content: La humanidad ha experimentado en corto tiempo, un avance significativo de la tecnología reflejado en la instalación de equipos como el denominado rúter, por ejemplo, cuya funcionalidad nos permite hoy acceder a WiFi y generalmente está conectado a un módem. Con respecto a este importante dispositivo, la velocidad del Internet proveniente de dicha red inalámbrica, representa la vital característica que podría aumentar mediante el uso de hasta un par de objetos, tal y como lo precisan diversos portales especializados. Tomando en cuenta su importancia, a continuación te indicamos cuáles son, cómo pueden ser colocados detrás de dicha herramienta básica para el hogar, beneficios, características y mucho más. ESTOS DOS OBJETOS PODRÍAN AYUDARTE A RECIBIR MAYOR VELOCIDAD DE INTERNET SI LOS COLOCAS DETRÁS DEL ROUTER QUE PROPORCIONA WIFI Hoy el trabajo remoto todavía continúa llevándose a cabo en países que lo pusieron en práctica a partir de la implementación del confinamiento por la coyuntura sanitaria iniciada en 2020, siendo por ello vital que nuestra conexión a Internet sea óptima e ideal para la realización de diversas actividades con una rapidez que podría aumentar si colocas detrás de router que proporciona WiFi estos dos objetos según informa Semana gracias a Inteligencia Artificial (IA). title: “Me hubiese encantado...”: Waldo Villarroel nuevamente se le declaró a Camila Andrade
content: Un tierno momento ocurrió durante las últimas horas en Gran Hermano , en las horas previas al temido domingo de eliminación que tiene a tres nominados en la placa: Manuel, Miguel y Cami Andrade. Fue precisamente esta última la que protagonizó la escena, junto a Waldo Villarroel, quien ya ha admitido públicamente que gusta de la animadora, pero que respeta su relación con Francisco Kaminski. La influencer podría perfectamente ser la eliminada esta noche, y al parecer, al "Huaso" le dio por tocar el tema por última vez, asegurándole que las cosas hubieran sido distintas si ella hubiese entrado soltera. "Si hubiesen sido distintas las circunstancias, la suya, sobre todo, me hubiese encantado conquistarle. Pero conquistarle, de verdad. Creo que hubiese dado lo mejor de mí", le confesó el concursante. La exchica "Yingo" confesó que tiene ganas de conocer más allá a uno de sus compañeros de encierro. ¿Será Pancho o Rai? Síguenos en: Waldo no se quedó ahí, y declaró que la hubiese conquistado con " cosas que usted no conoce. Que la pudiera sorprender, o pudiese haberla visto. Sí podría haberla sorprendido, digamos". La respuesta de Camila Andrade no tardó en llegar: " A lo mejor yo te tengo incluso más cariño del que tú piensas, porque acá uno adora mucho más a las personas. Entre esas personas estás tú, Miguel, Pato, que me han demostrado pacientemente su apoyo". Luego, la ex Miss Chile le preguntó si es que no estaba confundido a causa del...
