title: Cubana Chief Priest’s restaurant sealed [PICTURES]
creator: Adejayan Gbenga Gsong
content: Lagos government seals Cubana Chiefpriest fast food outlet Adejayan Gbenga Gsong The Lagos State Environmental Protection Agency has sealed a fast food restaurant owned by Pascal Chibuike Okechukwu, also known as Cubana Chiefpriest, Donald’s Fast Food, located on Adebayo Doherty Street, Lekki 1, due to persistent noise pollution and other environmental violations. This was made known by the Commissioner of Environment and Water Resources Tokunbo Wahab, on X.com on Sunday. According to Wahab, the agency took the action after issuing several warnings and abatement notices to the establishment, which failed to comply with environmental regulations. The statement said, “After several warnings and abatement notices, the Lagos State Environmental Protection Agency #LasepaOfficial sealed Donald’s Fast Food on Adebayo Doherty Street, Lekki 1 over noise pollution and other environmental infractions.”

title: Mulher é espancada com pedaço de madeira em farmácia; VÍDEO
content: Câmeras de segurança filmaram o momento em que a vítima entrou no estabelecimento para tentar escapar do agressor e pedir socorro. No entanto, . Em seguida, ele fugiu ( ). Segundo o boletim de ocorrência, a Polícia Militar (PM) foi acionada pelos funcionários da drogaria, que fica na Avenida Abílio Machado, no bairro Dom Bosco, na Região Noroeste da capital. À corporação, . Mulher é espancada com pedaço de madeira dentro de farmácia A vítima contou que teve um desentendimento com a companheira dele anteriormente, o que teria motivado o crime. Ainda de acordo com o relato, durante as agressões, o homem ordenou que ela ficasse ajoelhada, e quebrou vários itens da loja. Com ferimentos na cabeça, nas mãos e nas pernas, a mulher foi levada para o Hospital Odilon Behrens, onde recebeu atendimento médico. Até o momento, . Os vídeos mais vistos do g1 Minas:

title: '인간극장' 체육 교사가 된 보육원 소년...고아들의 수호천사되다
creator: 신영선 기자
content: [스포츠한국 신영선 기자] 불우했던 고아 소년에서 굳은 의지와 부단한 노력으로 꿈을 이루고 자신과 비슷한 처지의 고아들에게 희망의 증거가 되고 싶어 하는 성남 씨를 만나보자. 오늘(16일) 오전 7시 50분 방송되는 KBS1 '인간극장'에서는 '나는 꿈을 이룬 고아입니다' 편이 방송된다. 가족들과 평범하게 사는 하루하루가 꿈만 같다고 말하는 남자가 있다. 경북 김천에 사는 이성남(48) 씨가 그 주인공이다. 다섯 살 때 한 살 아래 동생과 구멍가게 앞에 버려졌던 성남 씨는 가까운 보육원에 맡겨져 20년간 그곳에서 살았다. 아무리 생각해도 불우한 처지에서 벗어날 길은 공부밖에 없었고, 절박한 심정으로 학업에 몰두해 전교 1등, 학급 실장도 했다. 대학을 졸업하고 체육 교사가 되던 날, 성남 씨는 기쁨의 눈물을 쏟았다. 배려심 깊은 아내 박수진(43) 씨와 결혼해서 사랑스러운 딸 셋을 낳고 그토록 꿈꾸던 가정을 이룬 성남 씨는 행복하게 살리라 다짐했다. 배려심 많은 아내와 사랑스러운 세 딸이 있는 온기 흐르는 집. 앞으로 행복하게 살 일만 남았다고 생각했는데, 보육원의 어린 후배들이 눈에 밟혔다. 어릴 적 자신처럼 편견과 차별에 힘들어하는 아이들이 안쓰러워 일요일마다 함께 축구하며 큰형처럼 챙기기 시작했다고. 중학교 체육 교사 시절엔 보육원 후배들이 다니는 학교에 일부러 전근하러 가서 학교생활에 잘 적응하도록 다독였다. 체육 장학사가 된 지금도 오가며 보육원을 방문해서 아이들이 학교생활에 어려움을...

title: លោក​ត្រាំ​រួច​ផុត​ជីវិត​ពី​ការ​ប៉ុន​ប៉ង​ធ្វើ​​ឃា.ត​មិន​បាន​សម្រេច​ជា​លើក​ទី​២
creator: សុខ មង្គល
content: ​ភ្នាក់​ងារ​អែហ្វ​ប៊ី​អាយ​​ថ្លែង​ថា​លោក​ត្រាំ​ជា​គោល​ដៅ​នៃ​ការ​ប៉ុន​ប៉ង​ធ្វើ​ឃាត​នៅ​​ទី​លាន​វាយ​កូន​គោល​​នៃ​​រដ្ឋ​ផ្លរីដា​កាល​ពី​ថ្ងៃ​អាទិត្យ​។ ហេតុ​ការណ៍​នេះ​កើត​ឡើង​រយៈ​ពេល​៩​អាទិត្យ​បន្ទាប់​ពី​លោក​រង​ការ​បាញ់​ប្រហារ​ពី​ជន​ប្រដាប់​អាវុធ​វ័យ​ក្មេង​ម្នាក់​។ ប៉ុន្តែ​លោក​អាច​រួច​ផុត​ពី​ការ​ប៉ុន​ប៉ង​ទាំង​២​លើក​នេះ​។ លោក​ត្រាំ​បាន​បង្ហោះ​សារ​នៅ​លើ​បណ្ដាញ​សង្គម​ថា​ «លោក​មាន​សុវត្ថិ​ភាព​ជា​ធម្មតា»។ នគរ​បាល​​​មូល​ដ្ឋានថ្លែង​ថា​​កង​ការ​ពារ​សម្ងាត់​របស់​អាមេរិក​បាន​បាញ់​តម្រង់​ទៅ​រក​បុរស​​ម្នាក់​នៅ​ពេល​គាត់​​លើក​កាំ​ភ្លើង​វែង​ដែល​មាន​ភ្ជាប់​កែវ​យឹត​តម្រង់​ទៅ​រក​លោក​ត្រាំ។ ​នៅ​ពេល​នោះ ​លោក​កំពុង​ស្ថិត​នៅ​លើ​ទី​លាន​វាយ​កូន​គោល​។ ជន​ប្រដាប់​អាវុធរូប​​​នោះ​ដាក់​កាបូប​ស្ពាយ​​ចំ​នួន​២​​ទៅ​​​តាម​ខ្លួន ហើយ​​ព្យួរ​ទុក​នៅ​នឹង​របង​។ គាត់​ក៏​ដាក់​​កាមេ​រ៉ា​ម៉ាក​ហ្គោ​ប្រូ (GoPro)​មួយ​គ្រឿង​ទៅ​តាម​ខ្លួន​ផង​ដែរ​។ ​គាត់​លាក់​​ខ្លួន​នៅ​ក្នុង​គម្ពោត​ព្រៃ​ចម្ងាយ​ប្រហែល​ជាង​៣០០-​ជាង​៤០០​ម៉ែត្រ​ពី​លោក​ត្រាំ​​​។ ក្រោយ​ពេល​ធ្វើ​សកម្ម​ភាព​រួច​ បុរស​នោះ​បោះ​ចោល​កាំ​ភ្លើង​​ និង​ឡើង​ជិះ​​ឡាន​ដើម្បី​​រត់​គេច​ខ្លួន​។ ប៉ុន្តែ​គាត់​ត្រូវ​សមត្ថ​កិច្ច​ចាប់​ខ្លួន​​​​​យក​ទៅ​ឃុំ​ឃាំង​។ តាម​រយៈ​អ៊ីមែល​ផ្ញើ​ជូន​ក្រុម​អ្នក​គាំទ្រ​​របស់​លោក​ លោក​ត្រាំ​សរ​សេរ​រៀប​រាប់​ថា​ «មាន​ហេតុ​ការណ៍​បាញ់​កាំ​ភ្លើង​ជា​ច្រើន​គ្រាប់​នៅ​ក្នុង​បរិវេណ​ទី​លាន​វាយ​កូន​គោល​របស់​លោក​។ ប៉ុន្តែ​លោក​សូម​បញ្ជាក់​ថា​លោក​មាន​សុវត្ថិ​ភាព និង​មាន​​សុខ​ភាព​ល្អ​ជា​ធម្ម​តា​។ គ្មាន​អ្វី​ដែល​ធ្វើ​ឱ្យ​លោក​ខ្លប​ខ្លាច​ឡើយ​ ហើយ​លោក​នឹង​មិន​ចុះ​ចាញ់​ជា​ដាច់​ខាត»​​។ ​មុន​ពេល​កើត​ហេតុ​នោះ ទី​លាន​វាយ​កូន​គោល​របស់​លោក​ត្រាំ​បើក​ដំណើរ​ការ​តែ​មួយ​ផ្នែក​ប៉ុណ្ណោះ​។...

title: استجابة عاجلة لتداعيات الأمطار الغزيرة في سبها بتوجيهات حكومية
creator: الوطن الليبية
content: الوطن| متابعات بتوجيهات من رئيس الحكومة الدكتور أسامة حماد، وبتعليمات عاجلة من الوزير محمد دومة، أطلقت شركة المياه والصرف الصحي في مدينة سبها جهوداً مكثفة للتعامل مع الأضرار الناجمة عن الأمطار الغزيرة التي شهدتها المدينة مؤخراً. أرسلت الشركة مجموعة من المعدات اللازمة لتعزيز قدراتها الفنية في مواجهة التحديات التي خلفتها الأمطار، والتي أثرت على شبكات المياه والصرف الصحي. كما تم البدء في إرسال مواد تشغيلية إضافية لحل الاختناقات وتحسين كفاءة الشبكة. وأكد الوزير محمد دومة أن هذه الخطوات تأتي ضمن جهود الوزارة لتخفيف معاناة المواطنين وضمان استمرارية تقديم الخدمات الأساسية. وشدد على متابعة الوزارة للوضع عن كثب، وتوفير كافة الإمكانيات لدعم فرق العمل في هذه الظروف الصعبة. #سبها الحكومة الليبية تساقط الأمطار ليبيا يمكن قراءة الخبر من المصدر من هنا

title: [미 대선이후 통상변화는?...‘관세’로 무역 마찰 VS 청정에너지 보조금 유지
content: [헤럴드경제=배문숙 기자] 50여일 앞으로 다가온 미국의 대통령 선거 결과는 외교·경제적으로 밀접한 관계인 우리나라에 미치는 영향이 클 수밖에 없다. 특히 도널드 트럼프 전 대통령이 재선에 성공하면 통상 정책에서 역대 최대치를 기록하고 있는 대미 무역흑자(미국 입장에서 무역적자)를 문제삼아 모든 수입품에 10∼20% 보편적 관세를 부과할 가능성이 점쳐진다. 카멀라 해리스 부통령은 조 바이든 대통령의 한미동맹 중시 기조를 계승할 것으로 보여 원만한 관계가 예상되지만, 아직 구체적인 통상 공약을 제시하지 않아 물음표도 일부 남겨두고 있다. 16일 정부에 따르면 미국 대선은 오는 11월 5일 치뤄질 예정이다. 두 후보자인 트럼프 전 대통령과 해리스 부통령 모두 중국에 대한 강경 기조를 유지할 것으로 보이며 이에 따라 한중관계에 적지 않은 영향을 미칠 가능성을 배제할 수 없다. 재임 기간 중국과의 ‘무역 전쟁’을 개시한 트럼프 전 대통령은 중국에만 60%가 넘는 관세를 부과하고, 중국산 전기차 수입을 막겠다고 공약하는 등 이번에도 유세 과정에서 중국을 맹공하고 있다. 해리스 부통령도 중국과 21세기를 위한 경쟁에서 승리하겠다고 선언했으며, 민주당 정강은 중국의 불공정한 무역 관행 대응, 중국의 첨단기술 확보 차단, 미국 중심의 공급망 강화 등 바이든 행정부의 대중국 정책 근간을 유지했다. 다만 두 후보 간 차이가 있다면 트럼프 전 대통령의 접근은 독불장군식이지만, 해리스 부통령은...

title: 1歳児「早くここに飯置いて」→ ありえない“奇跡のポーズ”に爆笑! “人生何週目?”な姿に「社長!!」「かっけぇ~~~」(ねとらぼ)
content: 現在JavaScriptが無効になっています Yahoo!ニュースのすべての機能を利用するためには、JavaScriptの設定を有効にしてください。 JavaScriptの設定を変更する方法はこちら 9/16(月) 7:45 配信 なんという貫禄 人生何週目......? なんとも貫禄のある赤ちゃんの姿がX(Twitter)で話題です。 【画像】貫禄がありすぎる1歳児(全体) 投稿者は、1歳の男の子を育てるXユーザーのさなさん。「早くここに飯置いて」というせりふとともに、息子くんの写真を公開しました。 子ども用の椅子に座った息子くんは、テーブルに片肘をついて手をほおに当てています。もう片方の手はぞんざいにテーブルの上を指さしており、確かに「早く置いて!」と命令しているように見えますね。 息子くんの口はきゅっとむすばれており、ポーズと表情が相まって“偉い立場の人”にも見えてきます。 ふてぶてしくもキュートなこの1枚に、Xでは「社長!!」「かっけぇ~~~しびれます」「イイね! 貫禄ある」「はっすいませんっ! って反射で謝ってしまいそう」「きゃわすぎる」となごむ声が寄せられています。画像提供:さなさん ねとらぼ じいじと遊ぶ赤ちゃん よく見てみると...その姿に「笑い声も最高」「じいじイケメン」 我が家では夫のために毎日お風呂をためます。「1回40~50円のお湯代」と夫は言うのですが、本当でしょうか? 高校3年生で出会った2人が、15年後...... 世界中が感動した姿に「泣いてしまった」「幸せを分けてくださりありがとう」【タイ】 キッチンの「換気扇」をつけっぱなしにして旅行に行ってしまいました。いくら電気代を無駄にしたでしょうか? 「県庁所在地」が答えられない都道府県ランキング! 2位は同率で「富山県」「岐阜県」、1位は? 助けてください...年金6万円・82歳のおひとり様女性、「50年暮らしていたアパート」から立ち退き、新しい住まいも見つからず悲鳴 50代、「1日1捨」を11か月続けて革命が起きた。ものが減る以外の絶大の効果も 出産後第4子・二男のダウン症が判明。「長男には脳性まひが... 私には無理かもしれない」から「大丈夫、心配ない」に変わるまで【体験談】 「結婚してくれると言った27歳の彼が冷たくて」夫も子もいる43歳女性が陥ったもの ゴールデンレトリバーにしっぽでペチペチされた柴犬の行動に2.4万人が癒やされた

title: NYP: предполагаемым подозреваемым в покушении на Трампа является Райан Раут
creator: RT на русском
content: В правоохранительных органах США сообщили, что предполагаемым подозреваемым в покушении на бывшего американского президента Дональда Трампа является 58-летний Райан Уэсли Раут. Согласно New York Post, Раут часто хвастался своими добродетельными качествами и отстаивал левые идеи в социальных сетях. Отмечается, что подозреваемый учился в Государственном сельскохозяйственном и техническом университете Северной Каролины и переехал на Гавайи примерно в 2018 году. 15 сентября на Трампа совершили ещё одну попытку покушения. Позже член палаты представителей штата Флорида Джон Снайдер сообщил о задержании мужчины после стрельбы у гольф-клуба Трампа.

title: Morphed pics, threats end in suicide over 2k online loan
creator: Srinath Vudali
content: Hyderabad: A woman’s plan for wedding anniversary celebration turned into a tragedy when her husband ended his life, allegedly due to harassment from loan recovery agents over a paltry sum of 2,000 online loan . Ten days before his death, Sampath (name changed) from Petbasheerabad borrowed 2,000 through an online finance app, with a one-week repayment term. When he failed to repay, his wife received a message about the arrears, which she initially ignored. Later, she was shocked to receive a morphed nude picture of herself on WhatsApp. The accused had access to her photo as Sampath had shared it while applying for the loan. “After receiving the morphed image, she tried contacting the sender, but there was no response. The same picture was sent to Sampath,” an investigator said. Subsequently, she received a threatening phone call demanding loan repayment or face further defamation. The initial message came from a number with the international code +92 (Pakistan), which police suspect may have been spoofed. While the woman went to her parents’ house, Sampath stayed home. The couple was in touch during this distressing period but didn’t file a complaint. Sampath called to say he would visit her parents’ house for their anniversary celebration, but the next day, he died by suicide. His family then lodged a complaint, alleging harassment from recovery agents as the cause. In another such case in Kosgi of Narayanpet district, 21-year-old Anil Kumar lost over 2 lakh in online...

title: সাবেক এমপি লতিফকে আরো দুই মামলায় গ্রেপ্তার দেখানো হলো
creator: Swarup
content: নগরীর ডবলমুরিং থানার একটি মামলায় গ্রেপ্তার হয়ে কারাগারে থাকা বন্দর – পতেঙ্গার সাবেক সংসদ সদস্য এম এ লতিফকে চান্দগাঁও থানার দুটি হত্যা মামলায় গ্রেপ্তার দেখানো হয়েছে। গতকাল রোববার চট্টগ্রামের অতিরিক্ত চিফ মেট্রোপলিটন ম্যাজিস্ট্রেট সরকার হাসান শাহরিয়ার তাকে গ্রেপ্তার দেখানোর এ আদেশ দেন। এর আগে কড়া নিরাপত্তার মধ্য দিয়ে প্রিজন ভ্যানে করে চট্টগ্রাম কেন্দ্রীয় কারাগার থেকে এম এ লতিফকে আদালতে হাজির করে চান্দগাঁও থানার উক্ত দুই মামলায় গ্রেপ্তার দেখানোর আদেশ চেয়ে পুলিশের পক্ষ থেকে আবেদন জানানো হয়। নগর পুলিশের অতিরিক্ত উপকমিশনার ( প্রসিকিউশন ) মো . মফিজ উদ্দিন আজাদীকে বলেন , চান্দগাঁও থানার পৃথক দুটি হত্যা মামলায় এম এ লতিফকে গ্রেপ্তার দেখানোর আদেশ চেয়ে আবেদন করা হলে বিচারক তা মঞ্জুর করেন। আদালত সূত্র জানায় , ছাত্র আন্দোলনের সময় ১৮ জুলাই ও ৪ আগস্ট গুলিতে নিহত হন সায়মান ওরফে মাহিন ও ফজলে রাব্বি নামে দুই যুবক। চান্দগাঁও থানাধীন বহদ্দারহাট মোড়ে সংঘর্ষে তারা নিহত হন। এ ঘটনায় চান্দগাঁও থানায় পৃথক দুটি মামলা হয়। দুই মামলাতেই এম এ লতিফ এজাহারভুক্ত আসামি। ছাত্র আন্দোলনের সময় ডবলমুরিং থানা এলাকায়ও সংঘর্ষের ঘটনা ঘটে। এতে অনেকে আহত হন। এর মধ্যে এরশাদ নামে আহত এক ব্যক্তি ডবলমুরিং থানায় এম এ লতিফসহ অনেকের বিরুদ্ধে একটি মামলা করেন। সেই মামলায় ১৭ আগস্ট বায়েজিদ এলাকা থেকে পুলিশ তাকে গ্রেপ্তার করে। তখন থেকে তিনি চট্টগ্রাম কেন্দ্রীয় কারাগারে আছেন।

title: Con dupes 2 of 50L in T, nabbed in Raj
content: Hanumakonda : Warangal Cyber Crime Police (CCPS) arrested one cyber offender on the directions of Telangana Cyber Security Bureau (TGCSB) on Sunday. Police seized chequebooks, debit cards, credit cards, and mobile phones from the accused. The bank accounts of the accused have been frozen to prevent fraudulent transactions. The accused was identified as Kalu Ram (33), a resident of Degana Town in Rajasthan. Police said that the accused confessed to committing around 12 crimes across the country, including two crimes in Telangana, where he defrauded the victims of approximately 50 lakh. One victim from Hanumakonda was cheated of a sum of 21 lakh. The victim registered a complaint before the Warangal Cyber Crime Police Station in July 2024. We also published the following articles recently Cyber cons nabbed for credit card fraud lead police to nexus in Bihar Two men from Bihar were arrested in Gurgaon for operating a cyber fraud network that targeted online users across multiple states. They offered fake dealerships and increased credit card limits, collecting money from victims. Police recovered several forged documents, including sanction letters, and further investigations are ongoing. Tibetan man gives cyber cons access to 26 bank accounts, arrested Tibetan national Chhinjon Tharchin was arrested by UP STF in Noida for his involvement in cybercrimes. He used forged documents to obtain an Indian passport and helped fraudsters access Indian bank accounts. Previously...

title: Valley student wins 2nd national boxing championship
creator: Harry Funk
content: Traveling from New Kensington to Downtown Pittsburgh hardly would seem like a picnic, especially by bus. “I usually come every day, weekdays and weekends,” Valley High School sophomore Gea Fultz said as she wrapped up running a warmup mile on a treadmill at the 3rd Ave. Gym, the training site for Pittsburgh National Youth Boxing. She first donned gloves and stepped into the ring at age 11. Four years later, she can lay claim to a pair of national titles and, according to her mentor, celebrity status. “No matter where we fight in the country, when we walk in the door, she is pretty much the Queen Bee,” Pittsburgh head coach Jim Hoy said. “And a lot of it’s because she has this infectious smile. She’s kind to people. She’s a good look for the sport, for sure.” In August, Fultz bested a boxer from Texas to win the 110-pound class in the Junior (ages 15-16) division at the USA Boxing Women’s Championship in Louisiana. She accomplished a similar feat last year in Ohio, competing against 13- and 14-year-olds. “When it comes to nationals, it’s a lot of pressure. Sometimes, getting really, really nervous throws me off,” she acknowledged. “But at a certain point, you just get used to under a lot of pressure and being around a lot of people.” The spotlight will continue to shine on her this week as she joins a select group of Americans facing off against Team Ireland in Rio Grande, N.J. Then in December, she plans a trip to Richmond, Va., as a participant in the year’s final...

title: Andrew Price wins the 99th edition of the Crump Cup at Pine Valley
creator: USA TODAY Sports - Golfweek
content: Andrew Price won the 99th annual Crump Memorial Tournament at Pine Valley Golf Club in Pine Hill, New Jersey. He defeated Jimmy Ellis of Atlantic Beach, Florida, 2 and 1, on Sunday. Price, of Lake Bluff, Illinois beat Bradford Tilley of Easton, Connecticut, who was the medalist in stroke play and top seed, in the morning semifinal round, 2 and 1. Price, who posted 4-over 148 in stroke-play qualifying, took down Evan Beck in the first round and then Matt McClean, both by a score of 1 up. Ellis, , defeated Stewart Hagestad of Newport Beach, California in the other semifinal match. Jamie Slonis of Sewell, New Jersey defeated Gene Elliott of Norwalk, Iowa, in 19 holes to win the Senior Crump Cup. Gregor Orlando defeated Greg Nurse, 1 up, to win the second flight and Taylor Wood beat former Tour pro and reinstated amateur Bobby Wyatt, 4 and 3, in the third flight. The Crump Cup is the premier mid-amateur tournament in the United States. in the latest Classic Courses list.

title: PHOTOS: Victoria's Rifflandia starts off rainy
creator: Harry Corro
content: Determined music fans pulled ponchos over their best festival gear when rain poured on Friday night Sept. 13, a less than ideal start to this year's Rifflandia. Festival goers paid no mind to the wet weather and turned up, all 6,500 of them, according to organizers. Last year's opening night brought a record 8,000 fans to the music festival. The four areas within the festival grounds were swarmed with people, from the main stage, to the Phillips stage, Lafflandia and the Dome, each featured different artists catering to the all-ages crowd. What's new, what's changed, what's different? The big answer - the venue. This year's Rifflandia Festival embraced the urban downtown landscape at Matullia Lands in Rock Bay. It's also the the first time that the festival is being held in one location since it started in 2008. The festival was held over two separate weekends at two separate venues in 2022 and 2023. We were on the ground to capture the festies making the most of the experience amid the soggy weather. Rifflandia wraps up on Sunday, Sept. 15 with Feist playing the last set on the Main stage to close the festival.

title: Stream It Or Skip It: ‘Tulsa King’ Season 2 On Paramount+, Where Sly Stallone’s Dwight And His Gang Have High Ambitions And Bigger Enemies
creator: mliss1578
content: There are shows that have its characters get into a lot of insane and improbable situations, but we watch them anyway because the characters are so fun to watch. In the case of Tulsa King , there is nothing about the show that makes a hell of a lot of sense. But Sylvester Stallone and the show’s ever-growing cast are very watchable, especially as the show enters its second season. TULSA KING SEASON 2: STREAM IT OR SKIP IT? Opening Shot: The possessions Dwight Manfredi (Sylvester Stalone) had when he was arrested for bribing ATF agent Stacy Beale (Andrea Savage) are inventoried as Dwight is led to a holding cell. The Gist: While in the holding cell, Dwight meets a man who defrauded the government out of over $12 million in wind turbine subsidies, which gives him an idea that he puts in his pocket for when he gets out of jail and returns to his crew. Dwight makes bail when his daughter Tina (Tatiana Zappardino) puts up a property she owns as a bond payment, and his presence short-circuits chaos in the group, when Goodie Carangi (Chris Caldovino) tries to take charge, much to the rest of the group’s disagreement. As Tyson (Jay Will) drives Dwight around, he’s being hounded by reporters and followed by FBI agents, determined to make sure that Dwight doesn’t have a chance to harm Stacy. But he and his crew’s plans continue uninterrupted; his bar and casino are going well, and the dispensary has upgraded to a nicer, downtown space. When Bodhi (Martin Starr) and Jimmy (Glen Gould)...

title: A hundred years ago | Coimbatore water supply
content: Coimbatore, Sept. 14: The following Government order on the Coimbatore water supply scheme is issued: The revised estimate forwarded by the Sanitary Engineer for the supply of water to Coimbatore town with Siruvani River as the source of supply amounting to Rs. 41 lakhs are administratively approved. The estimate provide for the purchase in India of cast iron pipes of the British standard specification. The plans and estimates drawn up for the purpose are forwarded to the Public Works Department for technical sanction. The Government are prepared to make a grant of half the cost not exceeding 20.5 lakhs and the Council will have to find the other half. title: Napoli seriye bağladı
content: İtalya Serie A'nın 4. haftasında Antonio Conte'nin ekibi Napoli deplasmanda Davide Nicola'nın yönetimindeki Cagliari'yi 4-0 yendi. Unipol Domus'ta oynanan mücadelde Napoli'nin gollerini 18. dakikada Giovanni Di Lorenzo, 66. dakikada Khvicha Kvaratskhelia, 70. dakikada Romelu Lukaku ve 90+4'te Alessandro Buongiorno kaydetti. Napoli'nin yıldızlarından Romelu Lukaku mücadeleyi 1 gol 2 asistle tamamlarken, Khvicha Kvaratskhelia karşılaşmayı 1 gol 1 asistle bitirdi. Bu sonuçla birlikte Napoli ligdeki üst üste 3. galibiyetini alıp 9 puana yükselirken, Cagliari 2 puanda kaldı. Ligin bir sonraki maç haftasında Napoli deplasmanda Juventus ile mücadele ederken, Cagliari sahasında Empoli ile karşılaşacak.

title: Google Chrome is rolling out a new feature designed to help users manage their notifications more effectively.
creator: Agency
content: Google Chrome is rolling out a new feature designed to help users manage their notifications more effectively. The latest update brings an “Instant Unsubscribe” option directly within notifications, allowing users to quickly opt out of unwanted site notifications without the hassle of navigating through settings, according to GSM Arena. The feature is initially available on Google Pixel devices but is expected to be extended to other Android smartphones in the near future. Users will now see an “Unsubscribe” button within the notification itself. By tapping this option, users can immediately stop receiving notifications from that particular site. However, users should be aware that they will need to handle each notification individually. For those concerned about accidentally unsubscribing, Chrome offers an “Undo” function. According to GSM Arena, this allows users to reverse the action if they inadvertently opt out of notifications from a site they actually want to hear from. In addition to the new unsubscribe feature, Chrome is enhancing its Safety Check functionality. This updated safety feature will now run automatically in the background, monitoring for sites that use deceptive practices to gain notification permissions. Sites identified by Google Safe Browsing as misleading users will have their notification permissions revoked. According to GSM Arena, the improved Safety Check will provide notifications about actions it has taken, such as revoking permissions from...

title: Adrien Rabiot'nun yeni adresi belli oldu
content: Adı uzun bir süre Türk kulüpleri ile de anılan Fransız yıldız Adrien Rabiot, Marsilya'ya transfer oldu. Kulüpten yapılan açıklamada, "Adrien Rabiot ile prensip anlaşmasına varılmıştır. Oyuncu kısa süre içinde sağlık kontrollerinden geçecektir." ifadeleri kullanıldı. Fransız basınında yer alan haberlere göre; Adrien Rabiot, Marsilya ile 2 yıllık bir sözleşme imzalayacak ve yıllık 10 milyon euro maaş kazanacak. Geçtiğimiz sezon itibarıyla Juventus ile sözleşmesi sona eren 31 yaşındaki orta saha Adrien Rabiot'un ismi, yaz transfer döneminde Galatasaray, Fenerbahçe, Barcelona, Manchester United gibi kulüplerle anılmış ancak yıldız oyuncu herhangi bir takımla anlaşamamıştı. JUVENTUS PERFORMANSI Juventus'ta 2019-2024 yılları arasında forma giyen 29 yaşındaki Rabiot, İtalyan ekibinde çıktığı 212 maçta 22 gol attı ve 15 asist yaptı.

title: بمعنويات عالية...أسود الصالات متأهبون لخوض مونديال أوزبكستان والبحث عن أول تتويج بكأس العالم
creator: عادل أربعي
content: زنقة 20. طشقند يخوض أسود الأطلس مباراتهم الأولى في نهائيات كأس العالم لكرة القدم داخل القاعة 2024، أمام طاجيكستان، يوم غد الاثنين في طشقند، بعد إنهاء جميع الاستعدادات، بثقة كبيرة وبالكثير من الواقعية. وأكد لاعبو المنتخب الوطني، في تصريحات للصحافة، اليوم الأحد، على هامش الحصة التدريبية الأخيرة قبل المباراة الأولى عن المجموعة الخامسة، طموحاتهم الكبيرة في البطولة، مع التأكيد في الوقت ذاته على التحديات التي تفرضها مثل هذه المنافسة. وقال لاعب المنتخب الوطني، سفيان الشعراوي، “بالنسبة لنا، كل الفرق المشاركة في كأس العالم تتميز بمستويات كبيرة، وكل المباريات تتشابه مع بعضها”. وأضاف “لا نستصغر الخصوم، سنقدم كل ما نملك وسنلعب غدا من أجل الفوز”، مؤكدا ضرورة الحيطة والحذر من نتائج المباريات الاستعدادية التي تختلف عن سياق كأس العالم. وأشار قائلا “قمنا بالتحضير للمنافسة كما يلزم، بالتأكيد لعبنا مقابلات ودية ضد فرق تشبه في لعبها أسلوب منتخب طاجيكستان، لكن المنافسات في كأس العالم تختلف”. ولفت اللاعب إلى جسامة المسؤولية، مبرزا أن الفريق الوطني عازم على تقديم أفضل مما وصل إليه في النسخة الماضية بليتوانيا 2021. وتابع “نعلم أننا نحمل آمال كل الجماهير ولدينا إرادة في البصم على مسار متميز. خلال المونديال الأخير، كان الفريق الوطني ضمن أفضل ثمانية منتخبات. والآن نطمح في تحقيق إنجاز أفضل ولما لا الظفر باللقب، رغم أن هذه المهمة لن تكون سهلة”. وفي السياق ذاته، اعتبر لاعب المنتخب الوطني، أنس الدحاني، أن المباراة الأولى دائما ما تكون صعبة، لكن بفضل تجانس المجموعة والاستعداد الجيد يمكن إنجاز المهمة في أفضل الظروف. وقال “تساعدنا تعليمات المدرب هشام الدكيك ونصائح...

title: A second assassination attempt against former President Trump raises new questions
content: A gunman’s ability to get within shooting distance of former President Trump on Sunday has again raised the specter of violence in the American political landscape, a development that analysts said is all too expected as Trump’s followers vowed it would make them even more determined to reelect him. Just two months after a would-be assassin’s bullet clipped Trump’s ear in Butler, Pa., the Secret Service fired shots at a man with an assault rifle who had hidden himself in foliage less than 500 yards from the former president. The identity and motives of the suspect had not been revealed by late in the afternoon, but followers of the former president immediately rallied around him. “FIGHT! FIGHT! FIGHT! TRUMP 2024,” wrote one supporter on Trump’s Truth Social platform. “The greatest warrior,” chimed in Kash Patel, a former appointee in Trump’s Defense Department. In another post, Trump appears as a heroic figure, fists firing as he strides across a battlefield. “I AM SAFE AND WELL!” the missive read. “Our president Donald Trump.” It was followed by hands praying. After the first attempt on Trump’s life, in July, supporters and even some neutral political observers predicted that the violence would push him to an insurmountable lead over President Biden. But much has changed since then — most notably Biden’s failing debate performance, which caused him to drop out of the presidential race and to endorse Vice President Kamala Harris. By many measures since then, it has been...

title: ‘Cong afraid to embrace turncoats’
content: Hyderabad: BRS working president KT Rama Rao on Sunday came down heavily on chief minister A Revanth Reddy and industries minister D Sridhar Babu for their comments that Congress was not involved in the disputes between BRS MLA Padi Kaushik Reddy and defected legislator Arekapudi Gandhi . He questioned the integrity of Congress and ridiculed their political strategies. “Mr Over Smart Minister, according to your logic, is your ‘Chittanaidu’ (chief minister Revanth Reddy) still in TDP or has he fully crossed over to Congress? Even if we assume that you are right, who is the fool who went to our BRS MLAs’ homes and welcomed them into his party with the Congress scarves? Why such shameless politics?” he asked in his post on ‘X’. In the post, Rao alleged Congress displaying hypocrisy. He inquired why the Congress was eager to attract BRS MLAs while simultaneously denying such actions. tnn We also published the following articles recently Revanth Reddy takes a dig at BRS claim of making sacrifices during Telangana stir Telangana Chief Minister A Revanth Reddy took aim at the BRS leadership, questioning their amassed wealth despite claims of sacrifice during the statehood agitation. title: Auto crashes into bike, car; woman dies
content: Hyderabad: A woman housekeeping worker died and four others suffered injuries after an auto rickshaw in which they were travelling first rammed into a bike and a stationary car and later overturned at Raidurg on Sunday morning. The auto was moving from Tolichowki to Raidurg. Police said that Ratna Bai, 38, died and four others, who were injured, were hospitalised. Auto driver Raju, who allegedly drove the vehicle in a rash and negligent manner, first hit a two-wheeler and subsequently hit another car on the roadside around 6:30 am. After hitting the car at high speed, the auto overturned. The four passengers in the auto and the rider of the bike suffered injuries. All four passengers who were travelling in the auto were housekeeping workers in a local company. Police registered a criminal case against the auto driver for rash and negligent driving. We also published the following articles recently Ashamed Bengaluru auto driver denies slapping woman passenger Autorickshaw driver Mutturaj R was arrested for allegedly slapping a woman passenger who cancelled her trip but was released on bail after six days. He expressed regret over his behavior and claimed he only tried to snatch her phone. His driver's association is aiding him in regaining his driving privileges. title: Cadem: Los principales impactos del Caso Audios recaen en el Poder Judicial y el Gobierno
creator: Polet Herrera
content: La encuesta Plaza Pública Cadem, abordó el impacto de la crisis del Caso Audios en las instituciones. En primer lugar, destaca el órgano Judicial (62%), luego el Gobierno (32%) y en tercer lugar la Fiscalía (25%). Este domingo se publicó la encuesta Plaza Pública Cadem correspondiente a la segunda semana de septiembre, destacando el impacto del Caso Audios en las instituciones. En ese contexto, los encuestados fueron consultados sobre las entidades que asocian con la investigación liderada por el Ministerio Público. Cerca del 61% lo relacionó con el Poder Judicial , el 29% con la Fiscalía , el 27% con los abogados, el 21% con el partido Unión Demócrata Independiente (UDI), el Congreso con el mismo porcentaje y, finalmente, el Gobierno con el 17%. Respecto al impacto del Caso Audios , el 62% considera que el órgano judicial es el principal afectado por la crisis, seguido del Gobierno (32%), la Fiscalía (25%), el Congreso (23%), la UDI (21%) y los abogados (14%). Además, el 89% de los encuestados cree que el caso recién está comenzando y que se revelarán muchos más detalles. En el ítem de preferencia presidencial espontánea, Evelyn Matthei sube al 26% (+5 puntos), mientras que, por primera vez, la expresidenta Michelle Bachelet alcanza el 11%, superando al fundador del Partido Republicano, José Antonio Ka st , quien queda en tercer lugar con un 9%. ⬆️ #Cadem @evelynmatthei sube a 26% (+5pts) en intención de voto espontáneo y @mbachelet (11%) supera por...

title: Bhadrachalam has no temple board for past 12 years
creator: Sribala Vadlapatla
content: Hyderabad: After the state govt made its intentions clear to set up a trust board for Yadadri temple on the lines of Tirumala Tirupati Devasthanams , there have been a lot of demands from devotees for constituting a board for the Bhadrachalam Sree Sita Ramachandra Swamy Devasthanam. The previous governing board’s term ended in 2012 when Andhra Pradesh was united. A new board is yet to be formed even after 12 years. At that time, K Panduranga Rao served as board’s chairperson. Though it was promised during the previous BRS govt’s tenure that Rs 100 crore would be granted to the temple, nothing of such allocation was made. “Also, former chief minister KCR never presented the silk robes to the deity as was the tradition with his predecessors. The historic temple has been neglected in the last few years. Had a temple board been in place, it would have taken care of the temple’s problems,” a source said. The BRS govt did not bother to constitute a board to run the temple affairs during its 10-year rule. Bhadrachalam temple earns an annual income of over Rs 50 crore and is a grade-A temple in the state. After the Congress govt took over, Khammam district ministers Ponguleti Srinivas Reddy and Tummala Nageswara Rao held review meetings with senior officials on land acquisition for development of the temple. During the assembly election campaign last year, then TPCC chief A Revanth Reddy said that if the Congress was voted to power, they will focus on the development of Bhadrachalam...

title: Loan apps change tack, use links, APK files to net victims
creator: Pinto Deepak
content: Hyderabad: To evade detection by law enforcement agencies and continue their fraudulent activities , illegal loan app operators have shifted from their usual tactics and are now employing unconventional methods to reach potential victims. According to police officers, cyber criminals are now disbursing loans through WhatsApp links and APK files, which are not available on official app stores. Cyber crime investigators have revealed that when instant loan app crimes were rampant a couple of years ago, authorities had increased surveillance on organizers, who were reportedly supported and funded by Chinese entities. The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) and law enforcement agencies (LEAs) also began cracking down on loan apps operating without RBI approval and charging borrowers exorbitant interest rates. To circumvent these measures, loan app operators have started issuing loans using link-based apps that are not available on online platforms. Users receive links or APK files, which they could click on or download to install the apps. After submitting their credentials, users can instantly obtain a loan. In one such case, a trader from Dammaiguda had borrowed 3,000 and ended up paying the fraudsters over 25 lakh after they threatened to circulate morphed nude images of him to his contacts. In another instance, a young chartered accountant from Secunderabad received a WhatsApp link, took out a small loan of a few thousand rupees, and was harassed even after repaying the loan within...

The street, which was previously just referred to as the ‘fire lane,’ was reintroduced as ‘Lucchino Lane’ in honor of the late chairman of the WooSox. Katie Morrison-O'Day Many public officials were on hand, including Massachusetts lieutenant governor Kim Driscoll, whom Augustus now works for as the Secretary of Housing and Livable Communities, Worcester mayor Joe Petty, and congressman Jim McGovern. Rich Gedman, who grew up less than a mile from Polar Park, was the first to make a speech, talking about his full circle journey from Crompton Park, to Fenway Park, to Polar Park. title: ¡Ahorra dinero y energía! El truco del corcho de vino en el refrigerador: cómo y por qué funciona
creator: Lucas H
content: Debido a los altos montos en las boletas de enería, los usuarios están buscando distintas formas de reducir el consumo de energía eléctrica . Según los expertos, es fundamental disminuir los kilowatts diarios utilizados por los electrodomésticos. En este contexto, un truco que se volvió viral consiste en colocar un corcho de vino dentro de la heladera. El truco consiste en poner un corcho de vino dentro del refrigerador, especialmente si no está completamente llena. El corcho, por ser ligero y poroso, ayuda a reducir la cantidad de aire que el motor necesita enfriar, lo que baja el consumo energético. De acuerdo con un estudio de la Universidad de Harvard, este objeto actúa como moderador del flujo de aire dentro del refrigerador, dirigiendo el aire frío hacia las áreas que lo necesitan más. Cómo contribuye a la eficiencia energética Colocar el corcho en una de las estanterías facilita que el aire se distribuya de manera más uniforme en el interior del refrigerador . Esto significa que el motor del refrigerador tiene que trabajar menos para mantener una temperatura constante, lo que reduce su consumo energético. Además, el uso del corcho ayuda a evitar la acumulación de escarcha, otro factor que puede aumentar el gasto energético, ya que el aparato necesita trabajar más para mantener el frío en presencia de hielo. Otros beneficios del uso del corcho Además de ayudar a ahorrar energía, este truco puede mejorar la eficiencia general de tu refrigerador....

title: Hochwassertourismus: Wiener:innen erleben Hochwasser
creator: Zuzana Kobesova
content: Verpasse nicht die neuesten Inhalte von diesem Profil: Melde dich an, um neue Inhalte von Profilen und Bezirken zu deinen hinzufügen zu können. Eigentlich gibt es wenig Gründe bei Sturm und Regen, mit Hochwassergefahr obendrein, rauszugehen. Offenbar können aber viele Wiener:innen es nicht glauben: Wien-Fluss, dieser Rinnsal, der ist so angeschwollen? Just sammelten sich am Sonntag am Donaukanal bis Urania und weiter Richtung Stadtpark zahlreiche Schaulustige. Sie ignorierten paarweise die polizeilichen Absperrungen und spazierten wenige Meter vom Ufer entfernt. Sie machten Selfies und telefonierten. An einem Abschnitt stocherten Jugendliche sogar gefährlich nah mit Ästen im Wasser herum. Sieht so der Ernst der Lage aus? Unter den Leuten sind aber auch solche, die ungläubig auf den Wien-Fluss schauen und wie versteinert zu realisieren versuchen, was da gerade passiert. So sieht ein Jahrhudert-Wasser also aus? Jede:r von uns verarbeitet die Krisennachrichten anders. Die Sicherheit ist dabei trotzdem wichtig, weil der Nervenkitzel hier nicht nur für einen Einzelnen eine Rolle spielt. Wer sich in Gefahr bringt, ist auch für Hilfskräfte ein Risiko. Die Helfer:innen können sich nun aber nicht wirklich über zu wenig Realitätsbezug oder Action beschweren können. Jeder Mensch kennt Schmerzen aus eigener Erfahrung. Wenn es eine schonende und medikamentenfreie Möglichkeit gäbe, Schmerzen zu lindern, wäre es nicht fast schon verpflichtend, diese Lösung auszuprobieren?...

title: 8 photos of Taylor Swift having a blast at Chiefs-Bengals
creator: FTW Outdoors
content: Pop star Taylor Swift was back in Arrowhead Stadium on Sunday afternoon as the Kansas City Chiefs hosted the Cincinnati Bengals. The 14-time Grammy winner has been dating Chiefs tight end Travis Kelce since last summer, and she has become a mainstay at the games the last two seasons. Swift, for Week 2's game, took to a suite with her mother and friend Danielle Haim of the rock band Haim for the AFC matchup. In a back-and-forth affair, Swift was on edge taking in all the action as she cheered, waved to fans and looked nervous. Here are some of the best photos from the game.

title: ৭ কোটি টাকার ম্যুরালের পরিকল্পনা বাদ
creator: Swarup
content: প্রাকৃতিক মৎস্য প্রজনন ক্ষেত্র হালদা নদীর জীববৈচিত্র্য ও মৎস্য সম্পদ রক্ষায় মৎস্য বিভাগের ২০২৩ সালের নেওয়া দ্বিতীয় প্রকল্পে পরিবর্তন আনা হচ্ছে। আওয়ামী লীগ সরকারের আমলে নেওয়া দ্বিতীয় প্রকল্পটি ৪৬ কোটি ৩৭ লাখ ৭২ হাজার টাকা ব্যয়ে বাস্তবায়নের কাজ শুরু হয়েছিল। এই প্রকল্পের অধীনে রাউজানের রাঙামাটি সড়কপথে হালদা সেতুর কাছে ৭ কোটি টাকা ব্যয়ে বঙ্গবন্ধুর ম্যুরাল করার যে পরিকল্পনা নেওয়া হয়েছিল সেটি বাদ দিয়ে ওই টাকায় হালদাপাড়ের উত্তর – দক্ষিণ দুই প্রান্তে মৎস্য বিভাগের দুটি অফিস করার প্রস্তাব করা হয়েছে। জানা যায় , কয়েক বছর ধরে হালদা নদীতে মা মাছ ও ডলফিনের মৃত্যু নিয়ে পরিবেশবাদী ও হালদা বিশেষজ্ঞদের উদ্বেগের মাঝে মৎস্য বিভাগ নদীর জীববৈচিত্র্য রক্ষায় দ্বিতীয় প্রকল্পটি নিয়েছিল। এই প্রকল্পের অধীনে কাজ করার কথা ছিল নদীর দুই পাড়ে রাউজান ও হাটহাজারী অংশে থাকা ৬টি পুরাতন হ্যাচারি সংস্কার করে মৎস্যজীবীদের জন্য অধিকতর সুযোগ – সুবিধা বৃদ্ধি করা , হ্যাচারিগুলোর সাথে থাকা পুকুর সংস্কার , ডিম সংগ্রহকারী ও মৎস্য কর্মকর্তা – কর্মচারীদের প্রশিক্ষণ প্রদান , নদী দূষণমুক্ত ও নদীতে মাছ শিকারসহ অবৈধ তৎপরতার বিরুদ্ধে অভিযান পরিচালনাসহ জীববৈচিত্র্য রক্ষায় আইনের যথাযথ প্রয়োগ নিশ্চিত , দরিদ্র জেলেদের বিকল্প কর্মসংস্থান করা , অংশীজনদের নিয়ে ওয়ার্কশপ , সেমিনার ও গবেষণা করার। সর্বশেষ নেওয়া এই প্রকল্পের কাজ শেষ করার কথা ২০২৭ সালের জুনে। হালদার সুফলভোগীদের সঙ্গে কথা বলে জানা যায় , ২০২৩ সালের সেপ্টেম্বর থেকে প্রকল্পের কাজ শুরু হওয়ার কথা জানা গেলেও এর বাস্তবতা এখনো দৃশ্যমান নয়। হ্যাচারিগুলোর অবস্থা আগের মতো ভঙ্গুর। নদীতে জাল পাতা বন্ধ হয়নি। নদীপাড়ে নৌ পুলিশের ক্যাম্প থাকলেও মা...

title: Fantasy Football Waiver Wire: Early pickups for Week 3
creator: Yahoo Sports
content: Johnston has become so much of a punchline around the fantasy community that you might forget he was selected in the first round of the 2023 NFL Draft. Plagued by drops and other miscues his rookie year, many folks had pretty much written off the young receiver already. Looks like Johnston isn't writing back, though. , with leading the way on the ground (finishing with 131 rushing yards) and Johnston through the air. The Chargers probably could've ran their way to a victory in this game, but it's very intriguing to see Johnston lead the team in both targets (6) and yards (51). The two touchdowns were the icing on the cake. This will definitely be a ground-and-pound team, but the Chargers eventually will have to go to the pass. A wide receiver on this team will be fantasy-viable as long as is quarterback. Johnston is worth a speculative add. Even though Hunter Henry has been one of the more consistent tight ends in the game, he's usually not considered a top fantasy option at the position. He had a quiet Week 1; . Henry was the driving force of the Patriots' pass game in Week 2, going over 100 yards on the day against the . With the Patriots' wide receivers lacking a true target hog, Henry could continue to be that driving force, even ahead of a tough divisional matchup against the Jets in Week 3. Add him if you need TE help. Unless you're the Saints, scoring hasn't been high for most teams in the NFL thus far this season. That is doubly true if you're the Panthers, who have...

title: Ex-Steelers WR Diontae Johnson already frustrated with the Panthers | Sporting News
creator: Mike Moraitis
content: It has been a rough go of it for the Carolina Panthers over their first two games of the 2024 season, with the team losing both of its contests by a combined score of 73-13. Making matters worse, former Pittsburgh Steelers wide receiver Diontae Johnson is already expressing frustration with his new team. After recording just two catches for 19 yards on six targets in Week 1, Johnson had three catches for 19 scoreless yards on six targets in the 26-3 Week 2 loss to the Los Angeles Chargers . Following the Panthers' second loss of the season, Johnson was asked about the lack of downfield throws quarterback Bryce Young has made and it was clear the veteran wide receiver is already frustrated with his new team, and more specifically, the play-calling. "We all are (frustrated with the lack of downfield throw)," Johnson said, according to Joe Person of The Athletic . "But it is what it is. We’re not the ones calling the plays. So our job is to go out there and execute every play that they call, and put it on film." A former third-round pick of the Steelers in 2019, Johnson spent the first five years of his career with Pittsburgh before he was traded to the Panthers this past offseason in a deal that landed the Steelers cornerback Donte Jackson and saw the teams exchange late-round picks. “I guess they didn’t want to trade me nowhere in the AFC," Johnson said after he was traded. "I’m here now in the NFC. It is what it is. They did what they feel they had to was best on their part....

title: The 2024 Emmys winners list: Live updates of the 76th Emmy Awards
creator: Nardos Haile
content: -- Shares Facebook Twitter Reddit Email The 76th Emmy Awards are here and yes, this is the second Emmys this year. Last year's historic dual industry-wide strikes entirely halted Hollywood and postposed the 75th Emmy Awards to January. But the 2024 Emmys are back in their September slot and this time they're being hosted by Emmy-winning Eugene and Dan Levy , the comedy father-son duo most recognizable for their roles as Johnny and David Rose in "Schitt's Creek." This year's awards nominations were dominated by breakout shows " Shōgun " and " The Bear " both leading the way as the most Emmy -nominated shows in 2024. "Shōgun" landed 25 nominations and "The Bear" smashed comedy nomination records with 23 nods. The Emmys can be streamed on ABC at 8 p.m. ET. title: No alcanzó con el gol de Martínez Quarta
creator: Juan Alvarez
content: El marplatense Lucas Martínez Quarta marcó un gol pero no alcanzó para Fiorentina, que terminó perdiendo 3-2 en su visita al Atalanta, donde señaló un tanto Mateo Retegui. En otro partido de la cuarta fecha de la Liga italiana, Inter rescató un empate sobre el final en su visita a Monza (1-1). El puntero del campeonato es Nápoli, que goleó 4-0 como visitante al Cagliari. Mientras tanto, en un choque cerrado entre Genoa y Roma -con Paulo Dybala de titular y el marplatense Matías Soulé en el banco sin poder ingresar-, hubo igualdad 1 a 1.

title: Elderly man duped of 2cr by cyber crooks
creator: U Sudhakar Reddy
content: Hyderabad: A retired consultant lost 2 crore to cybercriminals posing as Mumbai police officers. Fraudsters put AV Mohan Rao under ‘digital arest’ and coerced him into sharing his bank account details. The incident occurred on Tuesday, Sept 10, 2024, when Rao received a call from an unknown number. The caller, who identified himself as an officer of Mumbai Police, told Rao that his Aadhar details and phone number were linked to money laundering and distribution of pornographic videos. To add credibility to their claims, the criminals sent Rao a ‘ digital arrest warrant ’ with stamps allegedly from the Supreme Court and other govt agencies. The caller demanded Rao share his bank account details and, under threat, he complied. The 79-year-old was then coerced into transferring 2 crore in three separate transactions to an account provided by the criminals. Realising the fraud, Rao filed a complaint with the cybercrime police station in Cyberabad on the same day. A case was registered under various sections of the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita (BNS) and the IT Act. This incident follows a similar case in August 2024, where an 85-year-old woman was defrauded of 5.9 crore. The criminals posed as Mumbai cybercrime officials, falsely claiming link of her Aadhaar details to money laundering cases involving Bollywood actress Shilpa Shetty and Jet Airways founder Naresh Goyal. In May 2024, another Hyderabad resident fell victim to a parcel scam and fake digital arrest, losing 1.2 crore over...

title: חנוך דאום חוטף מעלמה זק: "מנסה להבין אם אתה יותר שוביניסט או גזען"
content: חנוך דאום (צילום פייסבוק/חנוך דאום) ספרו רב-המכר של הקומיקאי והפובליציסט חנוך דאום "החיים הם תקופה קשה", הופך לדרמה קומית חדשה שתשודר בקשת 12 החל מיום שני הקרוב. הספר, כמו גם הסדרה החדשה, מציגים סיפורים מחייו האישיים של דאום והדיסוננסים בחייו כמתנחל שלא שומר שבת אבל הולך לבית כנסת ועדיין אינו חובש כיפה. כלומר, המורכבות של להיות בין דתי לחילוני, בין ימני לשמאלני, ובין מתנחל לאיש תקשורת ליברל וסטנדאפיסט נושך . מלבד דאום , שישחק את עצמו בתפקיד הראשי, בסדרה יככבו גם עלמה זק - בתפקיד אשתו של דאום, אפרת, שי אביבי – בתפקיד הרב הראשי של הישוב, ונטע רוט (אחייניתו של יאיר לפיד) בתפקיד בתו של דאום. בנוסף, בסדרה יפציעו בהופעות אורח גם אמיר דדון, אושרית סרוסי ועומר עציון . הצגת פוסט זה באינסטגרם ‏‎ פוסט משותף על ידי ‏‎חנוך דאום - Hanoch Daum‎‏ (@‏‎hanoch.daum‎‏) ‎‏ כזכור, בחודש שעבר דאום הודיע כי ינחה את הטקס האלטרנטיבי לאירועי ה-7 באוקטובר וביקר את השרה מירי רגב, האחראית על הטקס הממלכתי: " לאחר ששמעתי את דבריה הפוצעים והמכאיבים כל כך של מירי רגב, קיבלתי על עצמי להנחות את טקס הזיכרון הלאומי של המשפחות השכולות והחטופים", כתב, "כשם שהגיבורים שלנו נלחמו יחד באותה שבת ארורה, כך אנחנו נעמוד יחד, מימין ומשמאל, דתיים וחילוניים בחיבוק משותף. לזכרם". 22:18 העמותה צברה חובות של 3.1 מיליון שקל: נכנסת להליך פירוק 22:43 רשות המסים בבשורה משמחת: אלו הפיצויים שתוכלו לדרוש מעכשיו 00:00 מצוקת אינטל: מקצצת בחופשות, בקפה ובסלולר 00:42 התגובה המפתיעה של דיג'יי שארפ לדברי אימו על פרידה: "לא רוצה כלה כזו" 01:19 חנוך דאום חוטף מעלמה זק: "מנסה להבין אם אתה יותר שוביניסט או גזען" כל החדשות גזרות כלכליות בדרך?...

title: FG Expresses Hope For Reduction In Petrol Pump Price
creator: Success Nwogu
content: The Minister of Finance and Coordinating Minister of the Economy, Mr Wale Edun, has expressed optimism for a reduction in fuel pump price, adding that the Federal Government is giving relevant parties a chance to reduce the cost of petrol. This followed the lifting of petrol by the Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation Limited (NNPC Ltd) from the Dangote Petroleum Refinery on Sunday. Edu who was present during the lifting of the petrol congratulated the Founder of Dangote Refinery, Aliko Dangote and his team for the feat. He also congratulated the NNPC Ltd, led by the Group Chief Executive Officer, Mr Mele Kyari, the Ministry of Finance, and the Chairman of the Federal Inland Revenue Service (FIRS) for their respective contributions so far. The minister opined that Nigerians look forward to energy security and energy sufficiency, adding that relevant stakeholders “can also address the issue of cost.” He said the fuel pump price will ultimately reduce, with more efficient manufacturing at full capacity and sustained local petrol distribution. According to him, since today marked the commencement of petrol lifting from the Dangote Refinery, the federal government has given relevant oil stakeholders a chance to reduce petrol prices. He said, “We’re expecting that as this refinery, and even others, ramp up production, scale, and achieve greater economies of scale, there should be the opportunity and there is definitely the potential to reduce their costs, which should be...

title: Max Peraza y Luis Ángel “El Flaco” cantan “El corrido del patrón”
content: Max Peraza y su Bandononona arrancan celebración con un álbum de colaboraciones titulado “11:11” . Con 11 años de trayectoria como solista y una importante lista de éxitos como “Ya no vives en mí” (más conocida como “Cual Adiós” ), “Tu conciencia” , “Muchas gracias” , entre otras, ahora Max Peraza estrena “El corrido del patrón” , el primer sencillo de este material, el cual hace en colaboración con su amigo y gran cantante Luis Ángel “El Flaco” , logrando una interpretación destacada. También puedes leer: Regresan con éxito y un nuevo lanzamiento el Grupo Tropical Los Gorriones Este tema viene acompañado de su video musical , el cual se grabó en Mazatlán, Sinaloa , y ya se puede disfrutar en el canal de YouTube de Max Peraza , así como en todas las plataformas digitales, justo a tiempo para celebrar las fiestas patrias . Originario de Mazatlán y poseedor de un gran carisma y espíritu emprendedor; Max Peraza nace el 21 de agosto , bajo el signo de Leo , característico por su fuerza y constancia. Llevando en la sangre el gusto por la música, comenzó su carrera a los 18 años en una banda local "El Huizache" , para después incorporarse a "La 5.a Banda" y posteriormente a la "Banda La Reyna" donde le dio vida al afamado tema "El Tamarindo" . Fue hasta el año 2006 cuando Maximiliano Peraza dio un gran paso en su carrera y lo invitaron a formar parte como vocalista de la "Banda Rancho Viejo" , donde duró más de 6 años y colocó temas en los primeros...

title: Auto driver ends life after fight with wife
content: Hyderabad: A 29-year-old auto driver, allegedly upset over his wife not staying with him, died by suicide at Miyapur in the city on Sunday. The victim was identified as Sk Rafi . Police said that Rafi, who is a native of Sangareddy, married Sravani four years ago after being in a relationship with her for a couple of years. Rafi was staying in Sangareddy, making a living by driving an auto rickshaw, and his wife was staying in Miyapur and working in a private company here. The couple was staying separately due to family issues. Meanwhile, on Sunday, Rafi came to Miyapur to meet his wife to persuade her to come home with him. But an argument broke out between the two, after which he left her place. Later, he was found dead at a nearby construction site, said police. Miyapur police registered a case and started an investigation. title: Maharashtra polls likely in November, prefer two phases: CM Eknath Shinde
content: MUMBAI: Maharashtra CM Eknath Shinde Sunday said the assembly polls are likely to be held in the second week of November and that a two-phase election would be preferable, reported. Asked about the progress of seat sharing arrangements within Mahayuti, Shinde said the main criteria are winnability of a party in a seat and the party's strike rate. He said govt's Ladki Bahin Yojana has received a tremendous response, with over 1.6 crore women having registered. He also said 1.4 lakh applicants have been accepted for the Yuva Prashikshan Yojana , an internship scheme for unemployed youth.

title: Sujeto asesina a sus propios padres en Orizaba
creator: El Dictamen
content: Sujeto asesina a sus propios padres en Orizaba Un violento hombre mató a golpes y a puñaladas a sus padres al interior de su vivienda ubicada en las inmediaciones de la Unidad Habitacional El Trébol, de Orizaba, el presunto parricida huyó del lugar para evadir su responsabilidad. De acuerdo a la información proporcionada por la familia, el hombre identificado como Mario Antonio “N”, de 53 años de edad, agredió brutalmente a sus padres de nombres: Eduardo “N”, de 73 años, y Beatriz “N”., de 70 años, al interior de su domicilio ubicado en el Andador 1 de la mencionada unidad habitacional, ubicada en los límites con Ixtaczoquitlán. Tras el doble homicidio, el presunto parricida abandonó el lugar para darse a la fuga con rumbo desconocido y así evadir su responsabilidad. Autoridades acordonaron el área en Orizaba El lugar fue resguardado y acordonado con cinta amarilla preventiva por las autoridades de la Policía Municipal y de Protección Civil Local, mientras qué los parámedicos de la Cruz Roja confirmaron el fallecimiento de ambos adultos mayores. Ambos adultos mayores presentaban golpes contusos y heridas de arma punzo cortante; la mujer quedó sentada en el patio de su casa, el hombre quedó tirado en la entrada de su domicilio. Al sitio llegaron Detectives de la Policía Ministerial Acreditable con Peritos Forenses y personal de la Fiscalía Regional de Justicia del XV Distrito con sede en Orizaba, quienes tomaron conocimiento y efectuaron el levantamiento...

title: Se incendió vehículo en la avenida Gumilla
creator: Estefani Dos Reis
content: Cerca del mediodía un vehículo se incendió en la avenida Gumilla, cerca de la sede del Ipasme en San Félix. Funcionarios de la Zona Operativa de Evaluación de Daños y Análisis de Necesidades (Zoedan) Bolívar acudieron al lugar para verificar la situación, la cual fue controlada por los propietarios del carro con extintor. El vehículo siniestrado es marca Mazda, modelo 323. Bomberos presumen que el incendio pudo haber sido causado por los conductores eléctricos recalentados.

title: T leads in per capita income, economic data transparency
creator: Sribala Vadlapatla
content: Hyderabad: A recent report on ‘Inflation Targeting India’ highlights that 76% of districts in Telangana boast a per capita income (PCI) higher than the national average, presenting a stark contrast to states like Bihar. The report emphasizes the importance of district-level data on GDP and PCI, noting that Telangana and Andhra Pradesh are among the few states that provide such detailed data. In particular, the report covers GDP and PCI figures for districts like Ranga Reddy, Hyderabad, and Vikarabad in Telangana, as well as Krishna and Srikakulam in Andhra Pradesh. On the significance of data, the report mentions: “Apart from the revision of PCI inflation data, an example of missing data is the absence of disaggregated GDP numbers at the district level across states. Only a few state govts, such as Telangana, Maharashtra, Tamil Nadu, Andhra Pradesh, and Bihar (though with a lag), provide district-level GDP data for states. District-level GDP is crucial for better planning, potential industrialization, analyzing migration patterns, and driving agricultural reforms.” The report presents interesting observations based on district-wise PCI analysis : PCI of 76% of Telangana’s districts surpasses India’s average PCI. Mumbai's PCI is 37% higher than Maharashtra’s average. In Bihar, except for Patna, the PCI in all districts falls below the national average. The report also provides comparative figures for gross district domestic product (GDDP) across various regions — Ranga Reddy...

title: MIM: Revise income thresholds for new ration cards at regular intervals
creator: Roushan Ali
content: Hyderabad: All India Majlis-e-Ittehadul Muslimeen ( AIMIM ) has written to the cabinet sub-committee headed by minister N Uttam Kumar Reddy to study and suggest guidelines for issuing new ration cards . The committee should revise the income criteria for obtaining ration cards (food security cards) by the people, he added. In his memorandum to the committee, AIMIM president and Hyderabad MP Asaduddin Owaisi said all the reports show the poor and worsening nutritional status in the state and persistent inflationary pressure. The revision in eligibility criteria for ration cards was done in 2014 when the thresholds were increased from 60,000 to 1.5 lakh for rural areas and 75,000 to 2 lakh for urban areas. Since then, inflation has rendered the current thresholds insufficient. “Thus, it is not only recommended that the income-based criteria be revised upwards to reflect current economic realities, but also that the process of revisiting eligibility thresholds be institutionalised and mandated to occur after fixed intervals so as to assure continued welfare provision to the vulnerable,” Owaisi said. Telangana struggles when it comes to the National Food Security Act (NFSA) coverage, he said. “For food and beverage inflation, Telangana is experiencing an inflation rate (7.4%) higher than the national average (6.7%) and that of its peers. The onslaught of inflation is also high on the people of Telangana when considering fuel inflation and housing inflation,” he said. These...

title: মাজারের শৃঙ্খলা রক্ষায় ডিসিদের ব্যবস্থা গ্রহণের নির্দেশ
creator: Swarup
content: মাজারের শান্তি – শৃঙ্খলা রক্ষায় জেলা প্রশাসকদেরকে ব্যবস্থা গ্রহণের নির্দেশ দিয়েছে ধর্ম বিষয়ক মন্ত্রণালয়। গতকাল মন্ত্রণালয়ের সংস্থা – ২ শাখা থেকে জারিকৃত পত্রে এ নির্দেশ দেওয়া হয়। অন্তর্বর্তীকালীন সরকারকে বিব্রত করার উদ্দেশ্যে মাজারে পরিকল্পিত হামলার ঘটনার পরিপ্রেক্ষিতে ধর্ম বিষয়ক মন্ত্রণালয় এই নির্দেশ জারি করেছে মর্মে জারিকৃত পত্রে উল্লেখ করা হয়েছে। খবর বাসসের। এতে বলা হয় , পরিবর্তিত পরিস্থিতিতে দেশের আইন – শৃঙ্খলা বিঘ্নিত করার উদ্দেশ্যে কতিপয় দুষ্কৃতকারী দেশের বিভিন্ন স্থানে মাজারে হামলা চালাচ্ছে যা উদ্বেগজনক ও অনাকাঙ্ক্ষিত। মাজার ওলি – আউলিয়া ও দরবেশদের সমাধিস্থল বিবেচনায় এর অনুসারীরা দীর্ঘ ঐতিহ্যের সঙ্গে ভক্তি – শ্রদ্ধা ও জিয়ারত করে আসছেন। মাজারে শান্তি – শৃঙ্খলা ও ভক্তদের চলাচল স্বাভাবিক রাখার জন্য জেলা প্রশাসকদেরকে প্রয়োজনীয় ব্যবস্থা গ্রহণেরও অনুরোধ জানানো হয়েছে।

title: CHiQ remporte des prix mondiaux d'innovation technologique pour ses produits
content: BERLIN , 16 septembre 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- Créé en 1958, Changhong a évolué pendant plus de six décennies pour devenir un groupe complet d'entreprises multinationales, spécialisé dans l'électronique grand public ainsi que dans la recherche et la fabrication de composants de base. L'entreprise vise maintenant à devenir un groupe influent au niveau mondial dans le domaine des technologies de l'information électronique. De janvier à août 2024, le chiffre d'affaires de Changhong dans le secteur des appareils ménagers à l'international a augmenté de plus de 20 % en glissement annuel. Sur les marchés principaux tels que les Amériques, l'Asie-Pacifique et l' Europe , l'échelle a été maintenue et continue de croître régulièrement. Des avancées significatives ont été réalisées sur des marchés émergents tels que le Moyen-Orient et l'Afrique, formant progressivement une présence mondiale de Changhong dans le domaine de l'électroménager. Lors de l'IFA 2024, la série CHiQ XingBo de Changhong a été récompensée par l'« Extraordinary Audiovisual Experiences Gold Award » pour ses performances techniques exceptionnelles. En tant que modèle phare haut de gamme, ce téléviseur a rapidement pris une position de leader sur le marché des téléviseurs à taux de rafraîchissement élevé (288 Hz) depuis son lancement en août 2023. title: Maná Pulls Nicky Jam Collab After Donald Trump Endorsement: “Maná Doesn’t Work With Racists”
creator: Armando Tinoco
content: Maná has removed their collab with Nicky Jam , “De Pies a Cabeza,” from streaming services after the reggaeton star endorsed Donald Trump . The Mexican rock band shared a statement on social media following Nicky’s appearance at a Trump rally in Las Vegas. “Maná doesn’t work with racists,” read an image posted on the band’s Instagram page. A statement in Spanish on the caption read, “For the past 30 years, Maná has supported and defended the rights of Latinos around the world. There is no business or promotion that is worth more than the dignity of our people. That is why today Maná decided to remove its collaboration with Nicky Jam on ‘Pies a Cabeza’ from all digital platforms.” RELATED : Taylor Swift’s Kamala Harris Endorsement Triggers Megyn Kelly Into Meltdown: “Taylor & Her Boyfriend Travis Kelce Are The Epitomes Of Elite Snobs” Following Maná’s statement, many Latin celebrities commented to share their support. Alicia Machado, who won Miss Universe in 1996 when Trump owned the organization, replied, “Consistency in your actions is the balm of those who defend an ideal! Thank you, I’m totally Mana generation.” Nicky Jam’s endorsement of Trump came after the former U.S. president misgendered the singer, which Kamala Harris’ social media team noted to poke fun at him. “Do you know Nicky? She’s hot. Where’s Nicky?” Trump said in his introduction of Nicky Jam. Nicky Jam’s endorsement of Donald Trump comes as Trump received the endorsement of Taylor Swift, which...

title: La Asociación Internacional de Volcanología se reúne en La Palma en torno a la sismología
creator: CANARIAS7
content: Las Palmas de Gran canaria Lunes, 16 de septiembre 2024, 02:00 Necesitas ser para acceder a esta funcionalidad. Opciones para compartir Copiar enlace WhatsApp Facebook X (antes Twitter) LinkedIn Telegram Threads Coincidiendo con el tercer aniversario del inicio de la erupción del , estos días se celebrará en La Palma el congreso anual de la comisión de sismología volcánica y acústica de la (International Association of Volcanology and Chemistry of the Earth's Interior Iavcei). El se desarrollará entre este martes y el día 20 de septiembre en el municipio de El Paso y reunirá a especialistas de distintos puntos del mundo que compartirán sus investigaciones y los avances más recientes en esta área de la volcanología. En concreto, el encuentro se centrará en la y las distintas técnicas de análisis con debates en torno los nuevos sistemas de vigilancia sísmica y su combinación con otras técnicas de seguimiento de los procesos eruptivos. El congreso científico está organizado por el Instituto Geográfico Nacional (IGN) junto con el Ayuntamiento de El Paso y la Iavcei. El encuentro también cuenta con la colaboración del Cabildo de La Palma, la empresa pública Sodepal y las consejerías de Política Territorial, Cohesión Territorial y Aguas y de Transición Ecológica y Energía del Gobierno de Canarias, así como de la Delegación del Gobierno en Canarias. title: El Barça y Lamine, en estado de gracia
creator: Alfredo Relaño
content: Dos de los peores tragos del Barça en la última temporada se los hizo pasar el Girona , que le ganó los dos partidos, en Montjuïc y en Montilivi. Y en ambos, marcando cuatro goles. Dos derrotas lacerantes que aún latían en la víspera del partido de ayer , en el que vimos a los dos equipos muy cambiados. El Girona ha tenido bajas muy serias y aunque la mano sabia que lo maneja es la misma todavía está en reconstrucción. El Barça también es otro. Aunque sin apenas variación en la plantilla , se ha presentado en este campeonato sosegado, libre de compromisos con su tan manoseado ADN , seguro de sí mismo. Y con Lamine Yamal escalando, mes tras mes, otro peldaño en su carrera . Ayer se nos mostró como delantero muy fácil ante el gol, marcando los dos primeros. Di Stéfano decía que el primero vale por tres; el segundo, por dos y los siguientes llegan solos . No será tanto, pero sí es cierto que los dos suyos desmoronaron la moral del Girona y abrieron paso a la bonita goleada con que el Barça se confirmó como líder intratable. Cinco partidos, cinco victorias, 17-4 en el agregado de goles. Va como una moto. Ante su velocidad de salida resulta aún más inquietante para el Madrid su retraso en la puesta a punto . Sin llegar a tanto, también se le ve buena cara al Atlético, que ganó con goles de Gallagher, Griezmann y Julián Alvarez . Hay armonía en el equipo y una especie de estado oficial de optimismo que ayer se reforzó con los tantos de las dos...

De hecho, en el trimestre que va de abril a junio, los datos globales de seguridad han mejorado en respecto al periodo comprendido entre enero y marzo. De promedio, y de acuerdo a los registros incluidos en el portal estadístico de criminalidad del Ministerio del Interior, los ciudadanos y visitantes soportaron casi que en el primer trimestre. Entre enero y marzo se contabilizaron 601 delitos más que entre abril y junio: se pasó de 5.308 a 4.707 (-11,3%). Sin embargo, este descenso está condicionado, en buena medida, por el desplome de la comisión de hurtos. De los 601 delitos menos contabilizados en el segundo trimestre, un total de 403 correspondieron a pequeñas sustracciones sin violencia. Los hurtos pasaron del primer al segundo trimestre desde 1.439 a 1.036 (-28%), lo que implica que . El resto de los descensos de criminalidad hay que buscarlos en las riñas tumultuarias (-29%), en los robos con fuerza en establecimientos y otras instalaciones (-18%) y de la cibercriminalidad (-14%). title: সিএমপির আরও তিন থানায় নতুন ওসি
creator: Swarup
content: চট্টগ্রাম মহানগর পুলিশের ( সিএমপি ) আরও তিন থানায় নতুন ওসি পদায়ন করা হয়েছে। গতকাল রোববার সিএসপি কমিশনার হাসিব আজিজ এই আদেশ জারি করেন। এর মধ্য দিয়ে সরকার পতনের পর চট্টগ্রাম মহানগরে সবকটি থানায় নতুন ওসি নিয়োগ দেওয়া সম্পন্ন হল। গতকাল নগর বিশেষ শাখার ( সিটিএসবি ) পরিদর্শক মোহাম্মদ আরিফুর রহমানকে বায়েজিদ বোস্তামী থানায় , কাজী মোহাম্মদ রফিক আহমেদকে ডবলমুরিং এবং বাবুল আজাদকে পাহাড়তলী থানায় ওসি হিসেবে পদায়ন করা হয়েছে। একই আদেশে বায়েজিদ বোস্তামী থানায় দায়িত্ব পালন করা ওসি সঞ্জয় কুমার সিনহাকে বিশেষায়িত ইউনিট কাউন্টার টেরোরিজম ইউনিটে ফেরত আনা হয়েছে। আওয়ামী লীগ সরকারের পতনের পর পুলিশের শীর্ষ পর্যায়ে রদবদল চলছে। গত ৫ অগাস্ট পর্যন্ত সিএমপির বিভিন্ন থানায় ওসি হিসেবে দায়িত্বে থাকা কর্মকর্তাদেরও সরিয়ে নতুন ওসি পদায়ন করা হচ্ছে। এর আগে গত ৯ সেপ্টেম্বর পতেঙ্গা , বাকলিয়া ও বায়েজিদ বোস্তামী থানা ছাড়া অন্য ১৩ থানার ওসিকে সিএমপির বাইরে বিভিন্ন ইউনিটে বদলির আদেশ দেয় পুলিশ সদর দপ্তর। পরদিন বাকলিয়া থানার ওসি আফতাব হোসাইনকে সিএমপি কাউন্টার টেরোরিজম ইউনিটে বদলি করে পরিদর্শক ইখতিয়ার উদ্দিনকে বাকলিয়া থানার ওসি হিসেবে পদায়ন করা হয়। এরপর কাজী মোহাম্মদ সুলতান আহসান উদ্দিনকে বন্দর থানায় , মোহাম্মদ মজিবুর রহমানকে খুলশী থানায় , মুহাম্মদ ফজলুল কাদের চৌধুরীকে কোতয়ালী , গোয়েন্দা পুলিশের পশ্চিম জোনের পরিদর্শক মোহাম্মদ মনির হোসেনকে কর্ণফুলী , মোহাম্মদ মনিরুজ্জামানকে হালিশহর , জাহেদুল কবিরকে চকবাজার , রমিজ আহমদকে সদরঘাট , মোহাম্মদ সোলায়মানকে পাঁচলাইশ , আফতাব উদ্দিনকে চান্দগাঁও এবং মোহাম্মদ আখতারুজ্জামানকে ইপিজেড থানার ওসি হিসেবে পদায়ন করা হয়েছে। গত...

title: Metro footfall rises due to Ganesh fest
content: Hyderabad: As people celebrate Ganesh festival , the city’s metro has been witnessing an unprecedented surge in passenger numbers over the past two weeks, with daily ridership consistently exceeding the five lakh mark. The influx of visitors to the Khairatabad Ganesh festival has further contributed to the metro’s passenger rush, with Khairatabad metro station alone recording around 94,000 passengers on Saturday, including 39,000 entries and 55,000 exits. New measures to aid passengers include running extra trains with higher frequency during peak hours until the end of the Ganesh nimajjan, extending train operations beyond midnight on the Nimajjan day with the last trains departing at 1:00 am and reaching their respective destinations around 2:00 am on Wednesday morning. The authorities have also deployed additional police and private security personnel at Khairatabad and Lakdikapul Metro stations. We also published the following articles recently Flower prices skyrocket during ganesh festival In Kolhapur, devotees are struggling with high flower prices during Ganeshotsav, where mixed flowers cost Rs400 per kilo. Farmers cite reduced production due to floods and infections as reasons for the hike. Retailers sell flowers at inflated rates, while markets remain busy with people buying Puja essentials and idols. title: Hyd new hub for global talent amid squeeze in international job market
creator: Amisha Rajani
content: Hyderabad: As the global job market tightens, Hyderabad is rapidly becoming the preferred destination for overseas professionals seeking better opportunities. A recent report from the job portal Indeed has emphasised this trend, indicating an impressive 60% rise in job searches directed from foreign countries to India. Leading this migration are professionals from the UAE, US and UK. Between June 2021 and June 2024, job searches from these countries to India surged by 13%, 12%, and 7%, respectively, marking a significant shift in the global employment landscape. “India is increasingly being seen as a land of opportunity for professionals. This surge in interest from abroad underscores the confidence in India’s growth and its potential to lead in key industries,” said Rohan Sylvester, talent strategy advisor at Indeed India. TOI spoke to several overseas job seekers to understand the types of roles they are pursuing and their reasons for booking one-way tickets to India. The primary driver, according to these professionals, is the shrinking job market abroad, particularly in popular destinations like the US, UK, and Canada. The recent spike in unemployment rates in these countries has forced many young professionals to reverse migrate, with Hyderabad emerging as a prime landing spot. Booming IT sector These individuals are targeting Hyderabad for its booming IT and finance sectors and lower cost of living. V Saket Nagender, originally from Hyderabad and currently residing in...

title: Highly-touted young Pittsburgh Steelers CB makes huge play vs. Broncos
content: DENVER -- Pittsburgh Steelers cornerback Cory Trice Jr. made a huge play that has swung the momentum right back into their favor. After a 26-yard pass to Courtland Sutton and then a 50-yard pass to Josh Reynolds, the Broncos were set up in the red zone. When Broncos quarterback Bo Nix stepped back to pass on 2nd goal, however, he threw it off his back foot in the direction of top wide receiver Courtland Sutton. Just two plays before, Steelers cornerback Donte Jackson had to exit the game for cramping. That brought on second-year cornerback Cory Trice Jr., who won the top backup job for the Steelers after an excellent training camp. Trice missed the entire 2023 season with a torn ACL. Trice picked Nix off in the back of the end zone, capping those two snaps in the game with his first career interception. It was just another play for Trice, the starting dimebacker for the Steelers, to start the year, too. Standing at 6-foot-2, the Steelers intend to give him a bigger role as the season continues. title: Fuerte choque sobre Ruta 7, en Centenario: hay restricciones en el tránsito
creator: Keila Giles
content: Este domingo se presentó un fuerte choque sobre la Ruta 7 en Centenario, a la altura del cementerio. Al menos tres vehículos protagonizaron el accidente y hay personas lesionadas. Se registran demoras en el tránsito por trabajo policial y de Bomberos. El siniestro vial ocurrió alrededor de las 19 sobre la Ruta Provincial, entre Neuquén y Centenario. Según informó el medio Centenario Digital, el choque fue entre una Renault Duster y un auto Voyage, pero habría un tercer auto que fue alcanzado con daños leves por el impacto. El auto Voyage fue el más perjudicado ya que chocó de manera frontal. Como consecuencia una mujer que sería la acompañante tuvo que ser asistida por personal de salud. Respecto a los ocupantes de la camioneta Duster, el medio local informó que sería también una mujer la que tuvo que ser asistida. Aún se desconoce la gravedad de sus lesiones, pero se supo que las mujeres estaban conscientes y fueron trasladadas al hospital Natalio Burd. Hay restricciones en el tránsito debido al trabajo policial y de Bomberos voluntarios. Piden circular con precaución.

title: One dead and another fighting for life after fiery crash on Bruce Highway
content: One dead and another fighting for life after fiery crash on Bruce Highway READ MORE: Cairns helicopter crash: Shock details emerge about final moments of pilot who crashed into DoubleTree by Hilton By Cameron Carpenter For Daily Mail Australia Published: 23:40, 15 September 2024 | Updated: 23:42, 15 September 2024 e-mail One person has been killed and another is fighting for life after a horrific crash on Queensland 's Bruce Highway. The accident happened at around 5pm on Sunday when a ute traveling on the Bruce Highway near Myrtlevale, north of Proserpine, collided with another car. By the time emergency crews arrived, the car was fully engulfed in flames, Queensland Police said. The driver of the car, who has not yet been identified, was declared dead shortly after the crash. The ute's driver, a man in his 60s, was treated at the scene by paramedics and then airlifted to Mackay Base Hospital in critical condition. 'Forensic examinations are underway to formally identify the driver of the car,' police said. 'Witnesses, or anyone with relevant vision, are urged to contact police.' One person has been killed and another is fighting for life after a horrific crash on Queensland's Bruce Highway.
